item_story_key_1.name: Key
item_story_key_1.source: Use it to open the office door.

Item_WormholeCoin.name: Mira
Item_WormholeCoin.description: The currency issued by and circulates in Mirroria. Can be used on vending machines, service stations, restaurants, and other facilities across Mirroria.
Item_WormholeCoin.source: Can be used to purchase items in Mirroria.

Item_SoloLeagueCoin_1.name: Veron
Item_SoloLeagueCoin_1.description: Old Mirroria currency that is already out of circulation. It's said that you can still use these coins on some gachapon machines.
Item_SoloLeagueCoin_1.source: Can be used on out-of-market gachapon machines.

Item_Show_Equip_0_1.name: Explorer's armor
Item_Show_Equip_0_1.description: Lightweight leather armor worn by the shelter's exploration team.
Item_Show_Equip_0_1.source: Chance to get the following 8 Explorer's armors: Explorer's uniform, Explorer's pants, Explorer's boots, Explorer's helmet, Explorer's shoulderpads, Explorer's bracers, Explorer's gloves, Explorer's belt.

Item_Show_Equip_1_1.name: Vanguard armor
Item_Show_Equip_1_1.description: No longer used by Hykros, but still a hot item on the black market.
Item_Show_Equip_1_1.source: Chance to get the following 8 Vanguard armors: Vanguard suit, Vanguard legguards, Vanguard boots, Vanguard helmet, Vanguard spaulders, Vanguard bracers, Vanguard gloves, Vanguard belt.

Item_Show_Equip_2_1.name: Falcon armor
Item_Show_Equip_2_1.description: The new material guarantees protection with a simplified design.
Item_Show_Equip_2_1.source: Chance to get the following 8 Falcon armors: Falcon combat suit, Falcon combat leggings, Falcon combat boots, Falcon combat helmet, Falcon shoulderguards, Falcon wristbands, Falcon gloves, Falcon belt.

Item_Show_Equip_3_1.name: Elite armor
Item_Show_Equip_3_1.description: Standard equipment of the Hykros Special Forces. Provides excellent defense and resistance in just about any extreme circumstances.
Item_Show_Equip_3_1.source: Chance to get the following 8 Elite armors: Elite combat suit, Elite combat leggings, Elite combat boots, Elite combat helmet, Elite shoulderguards, Elite armbands, Elite gloves, Elite combat belt.

Item_Show_Equip_4_1.name: Fortress armor
Item_Show_Equip_4_1.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.
Item_Show_Equip_4_1.source: Chance to get the following 8 Fortress armors: Fortress legguards, Fortress sabatons, Fortress helm, Fortress spaulders, Fortress bracers, Fortress handguards, Fortress belt.

Item_Show_Equip_4_position1234_name.name: Fortress armor
Item_Show_Equip_4_position1234_name.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.
Item_Show_Equip_4_position1234_name.source: Chance to get the following 4 Fortress armors: Fortress bracers, Fortress legguards, Fortress sabatons, Fortress spaulders.

EquipShow_orange_physic_name.name: Fortress armor (Overload)
EquipShow_orange_physic_name.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.
EquipShow_orange_physic_name.source:
Contains 8 pieces of the fortress armor with a higher chance for random physical ATK and physical resistance stats.
Possible Rewards: Fortress armor fortress legguards, fortress sabatons, fortress helm, fortress spaulders, fortress bracers, fortress handguards, fortress belt.

EquipShow_orange_ice_name.name: Fortress armor (Glaze)
EquipShow_orange_ice_name.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.
EquipShow_orange_ice_name.source:
Contains 8 pieces of the fortress armor with a higher chance for random frost ATK and frost resistance stats.
Possible Rewards: Fortress legguards, fortress sabatons, fortress helm, fortress spaulders, fortress bracers, fortress handguards, fortress belt.

EquipShow_orange_fire_name.name: Fortress armor (Burst)
EquipShow_orange_fire_name.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.
EquipShow_orange_fire_name.source:
Contains 8 pieces of the fortress armor with a higher chance for random flame ATK and flame resistance stats.
Possible Rewards: Fortress legguards, fortress sabatons, fortress helm, fortress spaulders, fortress bracers, fortress handguards, fortress belt.

EquipShow_orange_thunder_name.name: Fortress Armor (Arc)
EquipShow_orange_thunder_name.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.
EquipShow_orange_thunder_name.source:
Contains 8 pieces of the fortress armor with a higher chance for random volt ATK and volt resistance stats.
Possible Rewards: Fortress armor fortress legguards, fortress sabatons, fortress helm, fortress spaulders, fortress bracers, fortress handguards, fortress belt.

Item_wood_1_01_1.name: Wood
Item_wood_1_01_1.description: It's not like you know how to build a house. Other than to use to start a fire, it's useless to you.

Item_Achievement_1.name: Achievement
Item_Achievement_1.source: Points gained after accomplishing an achievement. Accumulate achievement and claim rewards on the achievement page.

Item_Quest_A4001_1.name: Energy Stone
Item_Quest_A4001_1.description: Rock containing special energy. Used to activate certain matrix, perhaps?

Currency_Wormhole_1_1.name: Mystery Core
Currency_Wormhole_1_1.source: Mystery Core can be bought in the Wormhole Store.

TreasureChest1_1.name: Small Omnium collector
TreasureChest1_1.description: Use it to locate and collect Omnium scattered beneath the surface. Emits partial information intermittently. Just don't let others spot your placement.

TreasureChest2_1.name: Medium Omnium collector
TreasureChest2_1.description: Use it to locate and collect Omnium scattered beneath the surface. Emits partial information intermittently. Just don't let others spot your placement.

TreasureChest3_1.name: Large Omnium collector
TreasureChest3_1.description: Use it to locate and collect Omnium scattered beneath the surface. Emits partial information intermittently. Just don't let others spot your placement.

TreasureMap_1.name: Collector signal
TreasureMap_1.description: Complete information sent by an Omnium collector. One may even locate collectors placed by other Wanderers with it.
TreasureMap_1.source: Locate the Omnium collector using the received signal for a plethora of prizes.

TreasureMapFragment_1.name: Collector signal
TreasureMapFragment_1.description: Partial information sent by an Omnium collector. One may even locate collectors placed by other Wanderers with it.
TreasureMapFragment_1.source: Look for other bits of information sent by the same Omnium collector from other Wanderers. Find and recycle the device for a plethora of prizes.

TreasureMapFragment2_1_1.name: Collector signal
TreasureMapFragment2_1_1.description: Loose signals sent by an Omnium collector. One may even locate collectors placed by other Wanderers with it.
TreasureMapFragment2_1_1.source: Search for two other loose signals sent by the same Omnium collector from other Wanderers. Find and recycle the device for a plethora of prizes.

TreasureMapFragment2_2_1.name: Collector segment
TreasureMapFragment2_2_1.description: Loose signals sent by an Omnium collector. One may even locate collectors placed by other Wanderers with it.
TreasureMapFragment2_2_1.source: Search for two other loose signals sent by the same Omnium collector from other Wanderers. Find and recycle the device for a plethora of prizes.

item_activity_cooking_RM_1.name: Apple
item_activity_cooking_RM_1.description:
A rare kind of fruit. It's said that it can only be found when collecting fallen fruits in specific seasons.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_2.name: Wild boar meat
item_activity_cooking_RM_2.description:
Wild boar can be found in the forests on Astra.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_3.name: Turkey
item_activity_cooking_RM_3.description:
A rare ingredient. It's said that all the wild turkeys were taken by the Hyenas. Maybe we can get some from them.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_4.name: Sesame
item_activity_cooking_RM_4.description:
A rare ingredient. It's said it looks quite like brown rice. Maybe we can find some while collecting brown rice.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_5.name: Sugar cube
item_activity_cooking_RM_5.description:
A scarce resource in short supply. Maybe we can find some from the Heirs of Aida.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_6.name: Grapes
item_activity_cooking_RM_6.description:
A rare fruit that has never been found in the wild. Some say that the Ravagers have planted some in their secret base. Maybe we can get some from them.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_7.name: Salmon
item_activity_cooking_RM_7.description:
A rare ingredient. Salmon have long been extinct on Aida. Only lake bass come fairly close to how true salmon tastes.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity3_food1_name.name: Glutinous Rice Flour
item_activity3_food1_name.description: Soft, smooth, and fragrant glutinous rice. An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join the Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Casino's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Freight's terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food2_name.name: Lotus Seed
item_activity3_food2_name.description: Sweet and silky lotus seeds are delicious when made into a paste! An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join the Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Casino's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Freight's terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food3_name.name: Black Pepper
item_activity3_food3_name.description: A whiff of it makes the nose kinda itchy... An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join the Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Casino's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Freight's terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food4_name.name: Ice Cream
item_activity3_food4_name.description: Finish it before it melts! An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join the Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Casino's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Freight's terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food5_name.name: Bean Paste
item_activity3_food5_name.description: Enough sugar was put in while it was being made. Add more and you're going to lose some teeth! An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join the Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Casino's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Freight's terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food6_name.name: Nuts
item_activity3_food6_name.description: A variety of small and exquisite nuts that are rich in nutrients. An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join the Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Casino's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Freight's terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food7_name.name: Ham
item_activity3_food7_name.description: Red meat with streaks of white fat gives a unique and delicious flavor. An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join the Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Casino's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Freight's terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

Harvest_Shells_001_1.name: Conch
Harvest_Shells_001_1.description: Legend has it a beautiful, kind girl lives inside. And it tastes pretty good.

Harvest_Shells_002_1.name: Scallop
Harvest_Shells_002_1.description: One of the primary food source for coastal dwellers. Already seasoned with sea salt, just grill and serve.

Harvest_Shells_003_1.name: Carrion snail
Harvest_Shells_003_1.description: A rare variety of giant snail with a weird appetite, but is surprisingly tasty.

Harvest_Shells_005_1.name: Hermit crab
Harvest_Shells_005_1.description: It has grown again! And now it gets a new... steamy "house."

Harvest_Shells_006_1.name: Portunid
Harvest_Shells_006_1.description: Sea crabs living on the shallow edge of the sea which sometimes come ashore to soak up the sun. Very delicious.

Harvest_shells_007_1.name: Sea urchin
Harvest_shells_007_1.description: A delicacy from the shallow edge of the sea, though not for everyone.

Harvest_shells_008_1.name: Oyster
Harvest_shells_008_1.description: A favorite of the luminaries in the city. Rumors circulate about it having special effects.

Harvest_Shells_009_1.name: Barnacle
Harvest_Shells_009_1.description: It looks scary, but yummy to the tongue!

Harvest_Fruit_001_1.name: Fallen fruit
Harvest_Fruit_001_1.description: Fruit fallen to the ground. Edible if you clean the mud off.

Harvest_Fruit_002_1.name: Strawberry
Harvest_Fruit_002_1.description: Don't wait for it to ripen, or it would be eaten by wild animals long before that.

Harvest_Fruit_003_1.name: Phosphogranate
Harvest_Fruit_003_1.description: After the initial sour-sweet taste comes... only blandness left, yet it's a waste to throw it away.

Harvest_Fruit_004_1.name: Firedragon fruit
Harvest_Fruit_004_1.description: Remember to remove the seeds before eating it.

Harvest_Fruit_006_1.name: Thornmato
Harvest_Fruit_006_1.description: Although the plant's leaves turned into thorns after being exposed to Omnium radiation, the fruit itself tastes much better than before.

Harvest_Fruit_007_1.name: Balloon fruit
Harvest_Fruit_007_1.description: The matured form goes wherever the wind takes it.

Harvest_Fruit_008_1.name: Lard gourd
Harvest_Fruit_008_1.description: Tastes pretty good, actually, despite the irradiated appearance.

Harvest_Greens_001_1.name: Lettuce
Harvest_Greens_001_1.description: Are you craving power? Eat it, then you will have infinite power!

Harvest_Greens_002_1.name: Wild cabbage
Harvest_Greens_002_1.description: It resembles a ball, but that doesn't mean you can kick it like one.

Harvest_Greens_003_1.name: Broccoli
Harvest_Greens_003_1.description: Nutritious, and every kid loves it.

Harvest_Greens_005_1.name: Spicy onion
Harvest_Greens_005_1.description: Made my eyes water when I cut it, so I tried to rub my face...

Harvest_Greens_007_1.name: Laver
Harvest_Greens_007_1.description: A type of kelp. Easily washed ashore by waves.

Harvest_Greens_008_1.name: Fiddlehead
Harvest_Greens_008_1.description: Time to eat your veggie! Won't grow tall if you're finicky!

Harvest_Greens_009_1.name: Fish mint
Harvest_Greens_009_1.description: If you can stand the taste, you can't get enough of it.

Harvest_Greens_010_1.name: Peat moss
Harvest_Greens_010_1.description: The best choice for detox, though it has a weird taste.

Harvest_Greens_011_1.name: Black moss
Harvest_Greens_011_1.description: Grows only on the exposed cliff face. It's edible, at least.

Harvest_Mushroom_001_1.name: Mushroom
Harvest_Mushroom_001_1.description: Fungi seen in wild grasslands. Young lasses just love to pick them.

Harvest_Mushroom_002_1.name: Suncap
Harvest_Mushroom_002_1.description: Sprouts towards the sun only after raining. Supposedly tastes like sunshine.

Harvest_Mushroom_004_1.name: Firecap
Harvest_Mushroom_004_1.description: Seems to be a variety of woodear fungus transformed by elements of flame. Tastes rather spicy.

Harvest_Mushroom_005_1.name: Monkey head mushroom
Harvest_Mushroom_005_1.description: Bland in both taste and appearance, but allegedly very high in nutrients.

Harvest_Mushroom_006_1.name: Black truffle
Harvest_Mushroom_006_1.description: Rare and expensive mushroom that grows in rather specific, stringent environments.

Harvest_Mushroom_007_1.name: Ghost mushroom
Harvest_Mushroom_007_1.description: Fungi indigenous to caves. Eat too much of them and you'll be seeing stars.

Harvest_Fishes_001_1.name: Silver bass
Harvest_Fishes_001_1.description: Silver bass can live in freshwater or temporarily in the sea. They are meaty and delicious.

Harvest_Fishes_005_1.name: Lake bass
Harvest_Fishes_005_1.description: This fish is good any way you cook it.

Harvest_Fishes_006_1.name: Dabry's sturgeon
Harvest_Fishes_006_1.description: Sturgeon living in shallow waters. Small in size, great for braising or stew.

Harvest_Follows_001_1.name: Snow lotus
Harvest_Follows_001_1.description: Whoa! What a big ole white cabbage!

Harvest_Follows_002_1.name: Small Azalea
Harvest_Follows_002_1.description: Extremely high in medicinal value without side effects. Consume as much as you want.

Harvest_Nuts_001_1.name: Hazelnut
Harvest_Nuts_001_1.description: A certain account pegs this as the culprit of the cracking of tectonic plates during Ice Age.

Harvest_Nuts_002_1.name: Cocoa beans
Harvest_Nuts_002_1.description: Cocoa beans are versatile. One can make bitter coffee or sweet chocolates with them.

Harvest_Nuts_003_1.name: Pinecone
Harvest_Nuts_003_1.description: An apple might not be the only thing that drops on your head. It could be a pinecone.

Harvest_Nuts_004_1.name: Walnut shell
Harvest_Nuts_004_1.description: Eat more of it if you want to become smarter.

Item_Q201100_01_1.name: Sugar Paper
Item_Q201100_01_1.description: This appears to be something used to entertain children during the event. The event organizers must have missed it...

Item_Q201100_02_1.name: Lollipop
Item_Q201100_02_1.description: This appears to be something used to entertain children during the event. The event organizers must have missed it...
Item_Q201100_02_1.source: Used for the Candy Reclamation mission.

Tower_xingyuan1.name: Astrum
Tower_xingyuan1.description: The most widely-used energy source before Omnium was introduced to Aida. Can be used to power Omnium machinery, which is quite uncommon in this day and age.
Tower_xingyuan1.source: Used to shut down the Omnium Tower.

Energy_Tower1_1.name: Astra exploration points
Energy_Tower1_1.description: From Astra and into the unknown! Explore every corner of the world!

Energy_Tower2_1.name: Banges exploration points
Energy_Tower2_1.description: From the prosperous docks to the underground black market, how many unknown faces does Banges hide?

Energy_Tower3_1.name: Navia exploration points
Energy_Tower3_1.description: The barren island and the wastelands—two different worlds, each holding their own secrets and waiting to be discovered.

Energy_Tower4_1.name: Crown exploration points
Energy_Tower4_1.description: The secrets of the mountains are like precious minerals, waiting quietly for the day they are excavated.

Energy_Tower5_1.name: Warren exploration points
Energy_Tower5_1.description: The remote snowfields, both beautiful and mysterious... Their true face is rarely seen by the world.

Item_PaarlIsBreastpin_1.source: A delicate pin with a style that was popular years ago. It's well preserved.

RewardQuestBox_01_1.description: A box that the chamber of commerce specifically prepared for bounty hunters with all kinds of weird stuff in it.
RewardQuestBox_01_1.source: Open it and see what you get. A stone? Some money?

Title_name_1_1_1_1.description: Obtained after reaching 100% Astra exploration progress.

Item_q102017_1.source: An Omnium solution used to neutralize rage.

Item_fashion_002_1.name: Anti-radiation Jacket
Item_fashion_002_1.description: Transform into an anti-radiation jacket after being equipped.

gift_xianhua_1.name: Flowers
gift_xianhua_1.description: Give flowers to your friends to increase Intimacy.
gift_xianhua_1.source: Open the Gift page to send items to friends online.

Item_q204110_01_1.description: Lorry left this giftbox at the Astra Shelter.
Item_q204110_01_1.source: Used for the Lost Gifts mission.

Item_q202240_02_1.name: Blooming Flowers
Item_q202240_02_1.description: This flower was Nonna's favorite before she aberrated!

Item_q204150_01_1.name: Message
Item_q204150_01_1.description: A message from the Oz family. The handwriting on it is illegible.
Item_q204150_01_1.source: Used for the Family Portrait mission.

item_q204150_02_1.name: Family Portrait
item_q204150_02_1.description: A portrait of the Oz family.
item_q204150_02_1.source: Used for the Family Portrait mission.

StrengthenLevel_Transfer_01_1.name: Transfer Module
StrengthenLevel_Transfer_01_1.description: A small, precise device that can record, transcribe, and reform the enhancement information of equipment.
StrengthenLevel_Transfer_01_1.source: Item required to transfer the enhancement level of equipment.

Item_RefreshQuest_01_1.name: Refreshing disk
Item_RefreshQuest_01_1.description: Use it to reset Bounty Missions.
Item_RefreshQuest_01_1.source: Use it to reset Bounty Missions.

Item_PetExp_02_1.name: β memory chip
Item_PetExp_02_1.description: A chip used to implant training memories into smart servants. An optimized version of the α chip, featuring marginally upgraded data capacity.

Item_PetExp_03_1.name: γ memory chip
Item_PetExp_03_1.description: The most cutting-edge chip for implanting training memories into smart servants. Features both upgraded data capacity and significantly improved information entry efficiency.

Item_WormholeLuckyCoin_1.name: Lucky Coin
Item_WormholeLuckyCoin_1.description: A coin said to have the power of changing one's luck, but not necessarily for the better. Use it to reset the random effect in Wormhole.

Item_RegressionCoin_1.name: Raid coin
Item_RegressionCoin_1.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a mechanical windmill relief.
Item_RegressionCoin_1.source: Can be exchanged for items in the Return Shop.

fashion_dress_18_1-1.name: Wasteland (1d)
fashion_dress_18_1-1.description: Marketed as both "gorgeous and dangerous," this outfit marks a breakthrough in the designer's craft, inspired by classical design.

fashion_dress_18_2-1.name: Wasteland (3d)
fashion_dress_18_2-1.description: Marketed as both "gorgeous and dangerous," this outfit marks a breakthrough in the designer's craft, inspired by classical design.

fashion_dress_18_3-1.name: Wasteland (7d)
fashion_dress_18_3-1.description: Marketed as both "gorgeous and dangerous," this outfit marks a breakthrough in the designer's craft, inspired by classical design.

fashion_dress_18_4-1.name: Wasteland
fashion_dress_18_4-1.description: Marketed as both "gorgeous and dangerous," this outfit marks a breakthrough in the designer's craft, inspired by classical design.

fashion_dress_21_4_name.name: Midnight
fashion_dress_21_4_name.description: Danger and opportunity lie ahead. Let us step into that night and go on an adventure.

fashion_dress_22_4_name.name: Era
fashion_dress_22_4_name.description: The core design concept of this casual sportswear is "rebellion, passion, and showiness." Those who see this can't help remembering the times before they moved to Aida on the Distant Beacon.

fashion_dress_23_4_name.name: Early Sakura
fashion_dress_23_4_name.description: An outfit made for the early spring out of soft fabrics, as soft as cherry blossom petals slowly floating down onto one's shoulders.

fashion_dress_24_4_1.name: Desert Exploration
fashion_dress_24_4_1.description: An outfit that combines practicality and comfort. Suitable for exploration in the desert.

fashion_dress_26_4_name.name: Starlight
fashion_dress_26_4_name.description: Upon wearing this dress, a sense of mission will arise... one that pushes the wearer to work hard all day and night to perform official duties.

fashion_dress_29_4_name.name: Fantasy
fashion_dress_29_4_name.description: Descend from the firework-filled sky, and rise from the soul of music. Dance the first delicate steps toward the golden age of fantasy.

fashion_dress_31_4_name.name: Fluffy Party
fashion_dress_31_4_name.description: This is the Fluffy Party! A furry look is the ticket!

fashion_dress_32_4_name.name: Silent Wings
fashion_dress_32_4_name.description: I witnessed the battleship burning on the fringe of Orion.

fashion_dress_33_4_name.name: Seaside Vacation
fashion_dress_33_4_name.description: It's time to kick back and relax! I heard that Banges may hold a Graceday Celebration event...

fashion_dress_34_4_name.name: Qinghong
fashion_dress_34_4_name.description: With a summertime mood like this, every day should be spent in joy.

fashion_dress_35_4_name.name: Academy Era
fashion_dress_35_4_name.description: Vows of the past are like the colorful bookmarks in that textbook.

fashion_dress_36_4_name.name: Race the Wind
fashion_dress_36_4_name.description: Youth is to be bold and do the unthinkable.

fashion_dress_37_4_name.name: Dawn
fashion_dress_37_4_name.description: Go far away to witness the miracle.

fashion_dress_38_4_name.name: Whimsical Movement
fashion_dress_38_4_name.description: Play to your heart's content before the night fades, before the candles burn out.

fashion_dress_39_4_name.name: Rosy Banquet
fashion_dress_39_4_name.description: On a day when real ghosts and fiends can blend in with the festive crowd unnoticed, put this on and attend a costume party that smells like danger...

fragment_fashion_dress_31_4_name.name: Fluffy Party shard
fragment_fashion_dress_31_4_name.description: This is the Fluffy Party! A furry look is the ticket!
fragment_fashion_dress_31_4_name.source: Collect 2 Fluffy Party shards to fuse Fluffy Party.

05749F044A652B77F176478D08396401.name: Layer Cake
05749F044A652B77F176478D08396401.description: Creamy, sweet, and soft like a sponge cake.

3B21002D4DD5406B31B98CBE2A0BEBE5.name: Curtain
3B21002D4DD5406B31B98CBE2A0BEBE5.description: After the curtains fall, Dracula stretches his wings in a place beyond the spotlight.

Hat_4_4_4_name.name: Demon Holiday
Hat_4_4_4_name.description: Don't look at me in a strange way. Of course I also take vacations.

Hat_5_4_4_name.name: Demon Devotee
Hat_5_4_4_name.description: I'm not good-looking, but I'm very gentle.

25A628F048F18EC449766FBCFEF48F3E.name: Shirli Hairpin
25A628F048F18EC449766FBCFEF48F3E.description: A handmade clay hairpin from Celine of Astra Shelter, shows a very cute expression.

D64FDF054ED8F860B82EC4AA5BA35966.name: Donut
D64FDF054ED8F860B82EC4AA5BA35966.description: Hang it as a decoration, and take it down to eat it at any time you wish. How convenient.

617950CE4019A30A3F83CA8362925746.name: Ice Crown
617950CE4019A30A3F83CA8362925746.description: One's temperament can be fully shown... but other than Meryl, who else can bear such cold air of a fully automatic air conditioner on their head?

B161FFD845D8087B48CF469340DB9957.name: Mi-a Antenna
B161FFD845D8087B48CF469340DB9957.description: It's not an ear, or a feeler or any external organ.

9B464ABE4F62970C9B46FCBD1F6125E5.name: Small Round Bean
9B464ABE4F62970C9B46FCBD1F6125E5.description: This hair clip looks incredibly familiar... Who could have lost it?

0EC30F97456CBBC1169319A218D3B7B8.name: Heart to Heart
0EC30F97456CBBC1169319A218D3B7B8.description: Just by wearing this, even a bruiser could easily become a cutie.

93C1E97E4643B6B9F8D3AE93AD7259C3.name: Tsubasa Hairpin
93C1E97E4643B6B9F8D3AE93AD7259C3.description: You will be considered the same as her... which is that you don't belong anywhere.

21F7524040822B8A9F750FA377FAF3EA.name: Frigg Hairpin
21F7524040822B8A9F750FA377FAF3EA.description: Although it seems like it doesn't quite fit the character... some Heirs of Aida still like it very much.

3E6DE9624F6B04B434CA9182D9AC73A0.name: Rhythmic Headphones
3E6DE9624F6B04B434CA9182D9AC73A0.description: It's supposed to be a music player. Instead, because of its chic design, it is often used as an accessory. What a shame!

A0FD02ED41BF4CF829E637AE3C0957A9.name: Night Butterfly
A0FD02ED41BF4CF829E637AE3C0957A9.description: A matching accessory specifically picked out to smoothly sneak into a banquet... But, how do you move around in something so clunky?

757C1BBD48F28EF32AD4A8B463092F1D.name: Dragon Boat Branch
757C1BBD48F28EF32AD4A8B463092F1D.description: I saw something similar on the bow of the mechanical dragon boat made for the festival... Was it taken from there?

CE76AC7D477B18CF4A3F9B990652A782.name: Pigeon Cap
CE76AC7D477B18CF4A3F9B990652A782.description: The brave and determined pudgy pigeon fears nothing.

398508FF4C721EBED22D84B55A23CB7D.name: Meow Meow
398508FF4C721EBED22D84B55A23CB7D.description: The same accessory worn by the renowned idol of Mirroria, Meow Meow. It's said that those who wear it will have a chance to share the stage with Meow Meow during her concert.

091AEB964478A253971A179E310AD2FE.name: Animal Hairpin
091AEB964478A253971A179E310AD2FE.description: An animal hairpin that can sit firmly in one's hair. It seems to have no special function other than to look cute. But honestly, isn't that enough?

D09421A74BB85220E3CB46B9B5EFD1C7.name: Birthday Crown
D09421A74BB85220E3CB46B9B5EFD1C7.description: A shiny crown that draws the attention of everyone in its vicinity. But it can't play a birthday song on loop.

F09DF85642629336EB8CD2AE68421BF4.name: Crystal Loop
F09DF85642629336EB8CD2AE68421BF4.description: Best not to touch it unless you wanna get stung.

3EB5AF524117DF3C2D11E3BBBF686EE4.name: Fox Mask
3EB5AF524117DF3C2D11E3BBBF686EE4.description: There seems to be an urban legend about a masked individual sneaking around Mirroria...

3733F8C7429C76AA660E24A25BA79BCA.name: Black Bunny Ears
3733F8C7429C76AA660E24A25BA79BCA.description: That black rabbit is so cute, how did you...

7F748E44485618EF28317B97BA6FC3F0.description: A magical item commonly seen in fantasy novels. Handfuls of candies can be hidden within. Can be viewed or equipped before the first full shot or forward shot.

Hat_27_4_4_name.name: Rosy Letter
Hat_27_4_4_name.description: Join the festive night parade with this elegant and mysterious outfit.

fashion_decoration_29_4-1.name: White Gauze Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_29_4-1.description: Originally used as a medical eye mask, it somehow began to be worn as a fashion accessory. Can it really make you look cooler?

fashion_decoration_31_4-1.name: Black Eye Band
fashion_decoration_31_4-1.description: A black silk eye cover to guarantee a good night's sleep. Both pleasant and practical, it's one of the most popular accessories for Wanderers. Duplicates are converted to 100 dark crystals and 20,000 gold.

fashion_decoration_32_4-2.name: Particle Lens
fashion_decoration_32_4-2.description: Features an ultra-high-performance microcomputer to take photos based on visual distance and intraocular imaging, as well as analyzes the composition and structure of all objects before you. Duplicates are converted to 100 dark crystals and 20,000 gold.

fashion_decoration_33_4-1.name: Windchaser Hairband
fashion_decoration_33_4-1.description: A fashionable hairband that is very popular in Banges. Sporting a simple shape as well as unique patterns and colors, this item sold out as soon as it hit the shelves.

fashion_decoration_34_4-1.name: Admiral's Shades
fashion_decoration_34_4-1.description: Originally made for seafarers, these shades suddenly became popular in Banges due to their unique shape and color, and later a symbol of high fashion.

fashion_decoration_35_bilibili-1.name: ACE Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_35_bilibili-1.description: Have you ever been blinded by love?

fashion_decoration_36_haoyou-1.name: Swimmer's Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_36_haoyou-1.description: Have you ever been blinded by love?

fashion_decoration_37_jiuyou-1.name: Series 9 Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_37_jiuyou-1.description: Have you ever been blinded by love?

fashion_decoration_38_oppo-1.name: Progressive Professor
fashion_decoration_38_oppo-1.description: Are you my test subject for today?

fashion_decoration_39_huawei-1.name: White Gauze Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_39_huawei-1.description: Originally used as a medical eye mask, it somehow began to be worn as a fashion accessory. Can it really make you look cooler?

fashion_decoration_40_tap-1.name: TapTap Monocle
fashion_decoration_40_tap-1.description: It's all blue in front of your eye.

fashion_decoration_43_1.name: Disguise Sunglasses
fashion_decoration_43_1.description: So long as I'm wearing these sunglasses, no one seems to recognize me... Why is that?

fashion_decoration_44_1.name: Steel Lizard Mask
fashion_decoration_44_1.description: I can't explain this to you, because I'm merely just a steel lizard hatchling.

fashion_decoration_47_4_1.name: Bubblegum
fashion_decoration_47_4_1.description: We've already secured it, so don't be afraid of blowing too much and breaking it.

fashion_decoration_48_4_1.name: Rolled Whistle
fashion_decoration_48_4_1.description: An affordable childhood memory toy. A lovely addition to parties as well.

fashion_decoration_50_4_1.name: Orange Eyepiece
fashion_decoration_50_4_1.description: It's capable of many things such as blocking impacts, analyzing battlefield data, protecting you from flashbangs, and more.

fashion_decoration_51_4_1.name: Pacifier
fashion_decoration_51_4_1.description: In this day and age, who out of all people isn't a baby?

fashion_decoration_52_4_1.name: Toot-Toot
fashion_decoration_52_4_1.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Spread the cuteness!

fashion_decoration_53_4_1.name: Nothing Happened
fashion_decoration_53_4_1.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Blushes hidden no longer!

fashion_decoration_54_4_1.name: Pile
fashion_decoration_54_4_1.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. This model is said to be the best-selling one.

fashion_decoration_55_4_1.name: Seal
fashion_decoration_55_4_1.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. The two colors on it suggest the conflict of dual personalities.

fashion_decoration_56_4_1.name: Construct
fashion_decoration_56_4_1.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. This face mask is in fact, a disguise for body components.

fashion_decoration_57_4_1.name: Hush
fashion_decoration_57_4_1.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Hush... Only silence from here on out now.

fashion_decoration_58_4_1.name: Cloak
fashion_decoration_58_4_1.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Conceal your true feelings of the moment.

fashion_decoration_64_4_1.name: Electric Wave Mask
fashion_decoration_64_4_1.description: Due to the influence of unknown electric waves, one can't help but put on this mask. It's time to set off in search of your own kind!

fashion_decoration_65_4_1.name: Monocle of Truth
fashion_decoration_65_4_1.description: Lies, hypocrisies, crimes... All these beautiful falsehoods are exposed through this glass.

fashion_decoration_66_4_1.name: Starry Glasses
fashion_decoration_66_4_1.description: I'm the brightest star in the kindergarten!

fashion_decoration_67_4_1.name: Radiant Glasses
fashion_decoration_67_4_1.description: Hot-selling glasses popular among entertainment venues in Mirroria. Supposedly can identify the songs being played and display their titles on the lens. That is just too cool!

fashion_decoration_68_4_1.name: Hanging silk
fashion_decoration_68_4_1.description: There are always some tiny little things with no good values other than being watched.

fashion_decoration_69_4_1.name: Amplification Goggles
fashion_decoration_69_4_1.description: Looks familiar... Am I able to see the world in her eyes?

fashion_decoration_70_4_1.name: Grapes Bubblegum
fashion_decoration_70_4_1.description: Smells like grapes on the breath.

fashion_decoration_71_4_1.name: Sunshine Pacifier
fashion_decoration_71_4_1.description: Vibrant little sun! Grow up quickly!

fashion_glider_2_4-1.name: Orion
fashion_glider_2_4-1.description: Tired of the Jetpack's look? It's time to add something new to your flight experience!

NPF_Energy_1.name: Fractured Energy
NPF_Energy_1.description: Fractured energy that can only be used to charge suppressors temporarily.

Item_Gem_001_1.name: Black nucleus
Item_Gem_001_1.description: A dark sphere naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium, it glows with a faint purple light, which seems to contain a certain amount of energy.
Item_Gem_001_1.source: For buying weapons with Special Order

Item_Gem_002_1.name: Black nucleus
Item_Gem_002_1.description: A dark sphere naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium, it glows with a faint purple light, which seems to contain a certain amount of energy.
Item_Gem_002_1.source: For buying selected weapons with black nucleus Special Order.

Item_Gem_003_1.name: Gold Nucleus
Item_Gem_003_1.description: A dark sphere, naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium, emits dazzling orange light, indicating that it contains colossal energy.
Item_Gem_003_1.source: Apply to the purchase of selected weapons with Gold Nucleus Special Order (not usable for Limited Orders).

Item_Gem_004_1.name: Red Nucleus
Item_Gem_004_1.description: A dark sphere, naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium, shines with an ominous scarlet light. One can only imagine the tremendous power contained within it.
Item_Gem_004_1.source: Apply to order weapons with Limited Orders.

Item_Area2Medicine_1.name: Anesthetic
Item_Area2Medicine_1.description: A powerful anesthetic that can render even an elephant comatose with a relatively small dose. A must for surgeons.
Item_Area2Medicine_1.source: Used for Searching the Depths mission.

Item_PermanentEnergy_1.name: Mighty mushroom
Item_PermanentEnergy_1.description: It contains a huge amount of Omnium essence. Permanently increase max endurance by 25 when consumed.
Item_PermanentEnergy_1.source: Permanently increase max endurance by 25 when consumed.

Item_bag2_1.name: 2-Slot backpack expansion device
Item_bag2_1.description: A portable Omnium storage attachment device.
Item_bag2_1.source: Permanently increase backpack capacity by 2 slots.

Item_bag4_1.name: 4-Slot backpack expansion device
Item_bag4_1.description: A portable Omnium storage attachment device.
Item_bag4_1.source: Permanently increase backpack capacity by 4 slots.

Item_bag6_1.name: 6-Slot backpack expansion device
Item_bag6_1.description: A portable Omnium storage attachment device.
Item_bag6_1.source: Permanently increase backpack capacity by 6 slots.

Item_q203030_001_1.name: Custom X-30
Item_q203030_001_1.description: Myers commissioned outside help to customize this new device. Has a strange shape that most ordinary people cannot comprehend.
Item_q203030_001_1.source: Used for the Tech Fanatic mission.

Item_q103006_1.name: Brand New Chip
Item_q103006_1.description: A brand new chip. Suspected to be Melo's lost language chip.
Item_q103006_1.source: Used for the Chip Search mission.

Item_q103011_1_1.name: Hanna's Supplies
Item_q103011_1_1.source: Supplies hidden away in a hurry. You can return them to Hanna on Cetus Island (-571, -911).

Item_q103011_2_1.name: Hanna's Supplies
Item_q103011_2_1.source: Supplies hidden away in a hurry. You can return them to Hanna on Cetus Island (-571, -911).

Item_q103011_3_1.name: Hanna's Supplies
Item_q103011_3_1.source: Supplies hidden away in a hurry. You can return them to Hanna on Cetus Island (-571, -911).

Item_q103011_4_1.name: Hanna's Supplies
Item_q103011_4_1.source: Supplies hidden away in a hurry. You can return them to Hanna on Cetus Island (-571, -911).

makeup_BackHair_000.name: Misty Rapids
makeup_BackHair_000.description: They say this is a hero's special hairstyle. I think they might be right.

makeup_BackHair_001.name: Eri
makeup_BackHair_001.description: Victory and defeat are determined before the fight even begins.

makeup_BackHair_002.name: Marie
makeup_BackHair_002.description: Say you need my help and I'll try my best to help you.

makeup_BackHair_003.name: Cena
makeup_BackHair_003.description: Whenever you're in danger, I will save you.

makeup_BackHair_004.name: Chiho
makeup_BackHair_004.description: Do you need my help? I won't give up on my friends that easily.

makeup_BackHair_005.name: Chiaki
makeup_BackHair_005.description: Even after I am gone, the beating of my heart will live on.

makeup_BackHair_006.name: Ruka
makeup_BackHair_006.description: Don't delude yourself. I couldn't care less about you! I didn't intend to do that!

makeup_BackHair_007.name: Matthew
makeup_BackHair_007.description: An awe-inspiring heart, shining brightly with pride.

makeup_BackHair_008.name: Rinka
makeup_BackHair_008.description: Just you wait... I'll take care of them in no time!

makeup_BackHair_009.name: Valter
makeup_BackHair_009.description: H-Hello... Oh, I just wanted to come and see you, that's all.

makeup_BackHair_010.name: Shirayuki
makeup_BackHair_010.description: Never give in to fate. Your life is in your hands.

makeup_BackHair_011.name: Moka
makeup_BackHair_011.description: Erm... Can you stay longer with me?

makeup_CenterHair_001.name: Leah
makeup_CenterHair_001.description: Your enemy is my enemy. I will be a trenchant sword for you to wield forevermore.

makeup_CenterHair_002.name: Mizuki
makeup_CenterHair_002.description: I want to be stronger... I don't want to be too weak to fight against all the things I hate in the world, anymore!

makeup_CenterHair_003.name: Elly
makeup_CenterHair_003.description: I don't like the way I am now. I just want you to remember how I used to be.

makeup_CenterHair_004.name: Carleen
makeup_CenterHair_004.description: No matter what suffering we must endure, I will always be with you.

makeup_CenterHair_005.name: Maeve
makeup_CenterHair_005.description: I've made it this far—don't slow me down anymore, okay?

makeup_CenterHair_006.name: Kiyohime
makeup_CenterHair_006.description: Even if no one else does, you understand me, right?

makeup_CenterHair_007.name: Chika
makeup_CenterHair_007.description: Don't give in to the cowardice in your heart! Go all out, for the sake of the mission!

makeup_ForeHair_000.name: White Rose
makeup_ForeHair_000.description: I used to dream of saving the world, but reality soon crushed those foolish ideals.

makeup_ForeHair_001.name: Fafner
makeup_ForeHair_001.description: No matter how powerful the enemy is, I will bring them down! Wait and see!

makeup_ForeHair_002.name: Vivian
makeup_ForeHair_002.description: All my life I suffered for my faith, but now I am finally free.

makeup_ForeHair_003.name: Camilla
makeup_ForeHair_003.description: There is no world in which one can live without faith. Please pray for redemption!

makeup_ForeHair_004.name: Shalltear
makeup_ForeHair_004.description: The perfect way to solve any problem is to take out everyone in your way. Don't you agree?

makeup_ForeHair_005.name: Flandre
makeup_ForeHair_005.description: This is not fate's doing—this is what we have chosen.

makeup_ForeHair_006.name: Rachel
makeup_ForeHair_006.description: I just want to protect my friends. I don't have the energy to worry about anyone else.

makeup_ForeHair_007.name: Julija
makeup_ForeHair_007.description: The truth is clear at a mere glance. If you choose to move on, I will choose to accompany you.

makeup_ForeHair_008.name: Yarreck
makeup_ForeHair_008.description: The more I indulge in pleasure, the more clearly I see that the world is falling apart.

makeup_ForeHair_009.name: Eve
makeup_ForeHair_009.description: I would like to dedicate my life to the world... to use it to maintain peace.

makeup_ForeHair_010.name: Elisha
makeup_ForeHair_010.description: The dark night sky needs not the blazing sun, but the gentle shining stars.

makeup_ForeHair_011.name: Elektra
makeup_ForeHair_011.description: To witness humanity's victory... I will live forever!

makeup_ForeHair_012.name: Louise
makeup_ForeHair_012.description: If no one else wants to, I'll try my best to fight alongside you.

makeup_ForeHair_013.name: Lucia
makeup_ForeHair_013.description: No matter how distant your dream is, try your best to make it come true!

makeup_ForeHair_014.name: Kaoru
makeup_ForeHair_014.description: Let me whisper something to you... I like you the best!

makeup_Hair_000.name: Glazed
makeup_Hair_000.description: A heart like steel and eyes like crystals—invincible across countless battlefields.

makeup_hair_001.name: Flow
makeup_hair_001.description: Mist ripples like water, promising endless friendship.

makeup_Hair_002.name: Dia
makeup_Hair_002.description: Staring at these eyes, you smile at me gently.

makeup_Hair_003.name: Yuzu
makeup_Hair_003.description: Is your heart still resolute? Do your eyes still shine with the faith you once had?

makeup_Hair_004.name: Sena
makeup_Hair_004.description: That night, I saw your eyes shining like stars.

makeup_Hair_005.name: Kali
makeup_Hair_005.description: It is thanks to my faith that I've made it this far.

makeup_Hair_006.name: Carleen
makeup_Hair_006.description: I want to end my enemies with one blow... I want to be the strongest in the world.

makeup_Hair_007.name: Reika
makeup_Hair_007.description: A noble temperament can never be restrained.

makeup_Hair_008.name: Jean
makeup_Hair_008.description: Where the sun cannot shine, I seek to cast a ray of light.

makeup_Hair_009.name: Sella
makeup_Hair_009.description: The way they live is the embodiment of beauty and strength.

makeup_Eyeball_000.name: Sabbah
makeup_Eyeball_000.description: No matter how similar our experiences are, our perspectives will always remain unique.

makeup_eyeball_001.name: Holy Word
makeup_eyeball_001.description: Please forgive this fickle world. I am willing to dedicate myself to you alone.

makeup_Eyeball_002.name: Snake Eyes
makeup_Eyeball_002.description: Eyes filled with danger and excitement also flicker with temptation.

makeup_Eyeball_003.name: Tranquility
makeup_Eyeball_003.description: Looking up, I can see the night sky, empty like an abyss, and I can feel your quiet presence around me.

makeup_Eyeball_004.name: Pallid
makeup_Eyeball_004.description: Resentment, damnation, and discontent. Evil is in the eyes of the beholder.

makeup_Eyeball_005.name: Heart-shaped
makeup_Eyeball_005.description: Cherish all you meet, and hope for world peace. Isn't that everyone's dream?

makeup_Eyeball_006.name: Heterochromia
makeup_Eyeball_006.description: Two colors, each representing a different facet of the soul.

makeup_Eyeball_008.name: Circles
makeup_Eyeball_008.description: Stare into my eyes too long and you might feel dizzy.

makeup_Eyeball_009.name: Crosses
makeup_Eyeball_009.description: Are these the eyes of the faithful, or the eyes of one completely devoid of faith?

makeup_Eyeball_010.name: Corona
makeup_Eyeball_010.description: When the sun loses its light, your eyes will replace it.

makeup_Eyeball_011.name: Otherworld
makeup_Eyeball_011.description: Fear the unknown, or sink into its bewitching gaze.

makeup_Eyeball_012.name: Tamamo
makeup_Eyeball_012.description: I want to see you carefree and happy, and I want to spoil you rotten!

makeup_Eyeball_013.name: Deep Sea
makeup_Eyeball_013.description: Eyes from the ocean depths, brooding and restrained, yet full of hope for the future.

makeup_Eyeball_014.name: Kitty
makeup_Eyeball_014.description: They say a cat can dilate its pupils whenever it wants. Come and give it a try!

makeup_Eyebrow_000.name: Crescent Tip
makeup_Eyebrow_000.description: They say people with eyebrows like this are smart, and passionate too.

makeup_eyebrow_001.name: Aging Beauty
makeup_eyebrow_001.description: I'm still beautiful... Don't you agree?

makeup_Eyebrow_002.name: Invisible
makeup_Eyebrow_002.description: In a way, it's still visible.

makeup_Eyebrow_004.name: Straight Line
makeup_Eyebrow_004.description: It's very simple—just a straight line.

makeup_Eyebrow_005.name: Chang'e
makeup_Eyebrow_005.description: Look like a goddess, every day.

makeup_Eyebrow_006.name: Black Jade
makeup_Eyebrow_006.description: Such brows should look demure and weak... So, why do they look so strong?

makeup_Eyebrow_007.name: Rolling Hills
makeup_Eyebrow_007.description: As thick as mountains, and as green as hills.

makeup_Eyebrow_008.name: Willow Leaves
makeup_Eyebrow_008.description: Curved eyebrows that look like willow leaves.

makeup_Eyebrow_009.name: River Bend
makeup_Eyebrow_009.description: Like fine flowing water, gentle and pure.

makeup_Eyebrow_010.name: Bright Eyes
makeup_Eyebrow_010.description: Do you feel the allure of my eyes?

makeup_Eyebrow_011.name: Feathered Jade
makeup_Eyebrow_011.description: Warm and steady, and as gentle as a feather.

makeup_Eyebrow_012.name: Flat Peaks
makeup_Eyebrow_012.description: Be flat and simple, just like these eyebrows.

makeup_Eyebrow_013.name: Glaring Eyes
makeup_Eyebrow_013.description: They may look ordinary, but no one knows how deep their anger goes.

makeup_Eyelash_000.name: Moon Princess
makeup_Eyelash_000.description: Like the moonlight—neither dazzling nor cold.

makeup_eyelash_001.name: Deep Sea
makeup_eyelash_001.description: Like the deep sea, they have their own story and the tenderness of a majestic whale.

makeup_Eyelash_002.name: Izumi
makeup_Eyelash_002.description: Like the deepest streams and clearest springs, transparent and refreshing, and embracing all things with grace.

makeup_Eyelash_003.name: Morning Mist
makeup_Eyelash_003.description: Like the morning dew, delicate but ephemeral.

makeup_Eyelash_004.name: Peacock
makeup_Eyelash_004.description: A proud glance belies an insincere heart.

makeup_Eyelash_005.name: Splendor
makeup_Eyelash_005.description: The tenderness of spring, the brightness of summer, the mellowness of autumn, and the freshness of winter—all in one pair of eyes.

makeup_Eyelash_006.name: Fawn
makeup_Eyelash_006.description: Even when frightened, the fawn's hopeful heart shines through.

makeup_Eyelash_007.name: Peach Blossom
makeup_Eyelash_007.description: Smile with your eyes and squint them into two crescent moons. Now, isn't that attractive?

makeup_Eyelash_008.name: Eyes of the Times
makeup_Eyelash_008.description: They all say these are dead fish eyes, but these are the eyes of the times!

makeup_Eyelash_009.name: Raindrops
makeup_Eyelash_009.description: Wherever these eyes cast their gaze, all will be well.

makeup_Eyelash_011.name: Dragon
makeup_Eyelash_011.description: Eyes of the divine, filled with silent dignity.

makeup_Eyelash_013.name: Prominent Brow
makeup_Eyelash_013.description: These ordinary eyes still seem to wind people up.

makeup_Eyelash_014.name: Mandarin Duck
makeup_Eyelash_014.description: Loving eyes, reminding you not to fall into a trap of empty pleasure.

makeup_Eyelash_015.name: Heron
makeup_Eyelash_015.description: Why do these terrifying eyes look so very gentle?

makeup_Eyelash_016.name: Willow Leaves
makeup_Eyelash_016.description: Eyes full of sadness, showing compassion for all living beings.

makeup_Eyelash_017.name: Mischievous Glance
makeup_Eyelash_017.description: Don't stare at me like that. I'll behave.

makeup_Eyelash_018.name: Wide-eyed
makeup_Eyelash_018.description: Wide eyes that stare like little bells.

makeup_Eyelash_019.name: Raised Brow
makeup_Eyelash_019.description: Don't look at me like that! I'll give you whatever you want! Here—take my wallet!

makeup_Eyelash_020.name: Almond
makeup_Eyelash_020.description: Clear, pure eyes that radiate a sense of innocence and simplicity.

makeup_Eye_000.name: Rainbow
makeup_Eye_000.description: Eyes that reflect the colors of the rainbow.

makeup_eye_001.name: Gray
makeup_eye_001.description: These eyes can see through the gloomy gray world.

makeup_Eye_002.name: Black
makeup_Eye_002.description: They say that these are the eyes of death...

makeup_Eye_003.name: Dark
makeup_Eye_003.description: These eyes can see through the very essence of darkness!

makeup_Eye_004.name: Red
makeup_Eye_004.description: Amid the bloody mist, these eyes have not yet lost their desire for life.

makeup_Eye_005.name: Clear
makeup_Eye_005.description: Clear and simple eyes. How can anyone refuse them?

makeup_Eye_006.name: Silver
makeup_Eye_006.description: Eyes imprinted with a maiden's prayers. Can you answer them?

makeup_Eye_007.name: Colorful
makeup_Eye_007.description: You can see the colors of happiness in these eyes.

makeup_Eye_008.name: R
makeup_Eye_008.description: Just like the sky above, sometimes clear and bright, other times dark and dull.

makeup_Eye_009.name: White
makeup_Eye_009.description: They say you can see hell through these eyes.

Task_Area2Cook.name: Half-finished Cafeteria Food
Task_Area2Cook.description: All products like this are the same. How could anyone think you can't afford it?

TestFindPath.description: Use it and then find the path.

TestOpenUI.description: Use it and then open the page.

Item_q203041_001.name: Broken Suppressor
Item_q203041_001.description: An item found while searching for Una, the scout who encountered the Ravagers. Spattered with bloodstains and badly worn. The word "Una" is faintly visible on its surface.
Item_q203041_001.source: Used for the Search for Una mission.

Mount_Strengthen_2_5_1.name: Multitasking Core
Mount_Strengthen_2_5_1.description: A multitasking core that can significantly boost data processing efficiency.

Item_q203045_001.name: Supply Box
Item_q203045_001.description: The supply box stolen from the Hyenas' camp for the blacksmith, containing fuel, rare ore, and smelting catalysts, among other items. Severely worn, only the letters "S" and "F" can be vaguely recognized.
Item_q203045_001.source: Used for Repairing the Omnium Guards mission.

Item_q203045_002.name: Titanium Driveshaft
Item_q203045_002.description: Titanium driveshaft used to repair Omnium Guards. Perfect for powering an armor's locomotion functions.
Item_q203045_002.source: Used for Repairing the Omnium Guards mission.

Item_q203048_001.name: X-II Armor Booster
Item_q203048_001.description: Mobility device used to repair Omnium Guards. Can be used with various types of armor.
Item_q203048_001.source: Used for Repairing the Omnium Guards mission.

Item_q103036_1.name: Mistbloom
Item_q103036_1.description: Mistbloom, a plant native to Raincaller Island, produces a huge mass of mist once its juice is compressed, making it an essential material for smoke bombs.
Item_q103036_1.source: Used for the Suppressive Fire mission.

Item_q103036_2.name: Smoke Bomb
Item_q103036_2.description: Hanna uses the Mistbloom juice to make a smoke bomb that produces a huge mass of smoke when thrown to block the enemy's vision.
Item_q103036_2.source: Used for the Suppressive Fire mission.

Item_q103042_1.name: Unknown Device
Item_q103042_1.description: Equipment stolen by the Ravagers. Appears to have no definite functionality on the surface.
Item_q103042_1.source: Used for Reap the Rewards mission.

makeup_face_001.name: Boiling Blood
makeup_face_001.description: What's wrong? Looking for a fight? No one messes with me!

makeup_face_002.name: Wound
makeup_face_002.description: This is the proof of your might!

makeup_face_003.name: Crescent Moon
makeup_face_003.description: This crescent moon is the proof of my genius. What I'm saying is, I'm really smart.

makeup_face_004.name: Gushing Love
makeup_face_004.description: I can't describe my love for you, but I can show it.

makeup_face_005.name: Meatball
makeup_face_005.description: This shows that our little cutie loves me! Don't you feel jealous?

makeup_face_006.name: Plaster
makeup_face_006.description: Let's get this party started! Let's do this together!

makeup_face_007.name: Vigorous
makeup_face_007.description: This is a sign of health, and of my optimism.

makeup_face_008.name: Wild Side
makeup_face_008.description: Whether going up a tree or down a river, I can handle it all! It's just in my nature!

makeup_face_009.name: Teardrop
makeup_face_009.description: From now on, sadness no longer needs to be expressed in words.

makeup_face_010-1.name: Unseasoned
makeup_face_010-1.description: Don't you dare look down on me by my appearances! I'm really strong!

makeup_face_011.name: Crimson
makeup_face_011.description: I only blush when it's hot... It has nothing to do with you! Don't misunderstand me!

makeup_face_012.name: Blush
makeup_face_012.description: Do you think I look cute?

makeup_face_013-1.name: Vermilion
makeup_face_013-1.description: Do you believe in reincarnation? They said that a mole on your face can record the tales of your previous life.

makeup_face_014-1.name: Simple and Honest
makeup_face_014-1.description: Don't feel down... The freckles on your face are really cute!

makeup_face_015-1.name: Vanish
makeup_face_015-1.description: A mark is as indelible as memory.

makeup_face_016-1.name: Ruthless
makeup_face_016-1.description: Fate prints cruel marks on your face.

makeup_face_017-1.name: Commoner
makeup_face_017-1.description: Rich in folk flavor, and suitable for those who are exposed to the elements all year round!

makeup_face_018-1.name: Noble
makeup_face_018-1.description: A decoration resembling a royal emblem. Go forth, brave adventurer!

makeup_face_019-1.name: Hunter
makeup_face_019-1.description: Whether hunter or prey, there is only a thin line between life and death.

makeup_face_020-1.name: Guard
makeup_face_020-1.description: Engrave your determination to protect those you love upon you.

makeup_face_021-1.name: Machinery
makeup_face_021-1.description: Is this... a screw here? You mean, you're an android!?

makeup_face_022-1.name: Kitty Cat
makeup_face_022-1.description: Learn how to meow with me!

makeup_face_023-1.name: Panda
makeup_face_023-1.description: All you need now is some bamboo.

makeup_face_024-1.name: Piglet
makeup_face_024-1.description: So what if it looks kinda silly? As long as it's cute...

makeup_face_025-1.name: Tenacious
makeup_face_025-1.description: These marks are proofs that I have given my all in battle.

makeup_face_026_name.name: Kiss of Stars
makeup_face_026_name.description: If we could keep the high spirits at its peak moment...

1061B569410AB74D299E149401B8E957.name: No. 1
1061B569410AB74D299E149401B8E957.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. No. 1 reporting!

085B266C4A4599D6005DC1B36F61DA39.name: No. 2
085B266C4A4599D6005DC1B36F61DA39.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. No. 2 reporting!

02A0BBC2456C019B7720168955270EC4.name: No. 3
02A0BBC2456C019B7720168955270EC4.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. No. 3 reporting!

359FD9B24991B76AA97421ABF59CFE77.name: No. 4
359FD9B24991B76AA97421ABF59CFE77.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. No. 4 reporting!

DF8EA8C84BE67773FA491595D0DA1078.name: No. 5
DF8EA8C84BE67773FA491595D0DA1078.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. No. 5 reporting!

B8421F384F4A5B66B9671088E649B6AB.name: Heirs of Aida
B8421F384F4A5B66B9671088E649B6AB.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. You won't wear this to Hykros, right?

43FB88994A257C9C9511E89E91C6CCCC.name: Steering Wheel
43FB88994A257C9C9511E89E91C6CCCC.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. It looks like a certain emblem from afar.

E4091AC6457E02D04965AAA5A4428BB9.name: Wheel
E4091AC6457E02D04965AAA5A4428BB9.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. One must admit it looks a little like a manhole cover.

06CB4306422D6DD7621047B15DFBC490.name: Tunnel
06CB4306422D6DD7621047B15DFBC490.description: With this collection of facial markings, all you need is one sticker to make you look trendy and highlight your beauty.

C7F1BB744C837719A53B419844F7FE2D.name: Stage
C7F1BB744C837719A53B419844F7FE2D.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. Thin geometric lines.

FD51315641295B4C204CA89324312EBF.name: Fork in the Road
FD51315641295B4C204CA89324312EBF.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. Divide the triangle into three equal parts.

A8C9D5E5409E84B406CC69AE77CB7ABC.name: Pile
A8C9D5E5409E84B406CC69AE77CB7ABC.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. Simple but not dull.

658FB6884C1B6972318BBD8EBEAB8C11.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy.

42808F8C480BAEBE86C7479ED0DD4C2A.name: Corner
42808F8C480BAEBE86C7479ED0DD4C2A.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Going down this road shall eventually bring you back to square one.

7CB7941C42794B6E1692CC8EA3EACCFD.name: Spikey Spike
7CB7941C42794B6E1692CC8EA3EACCFD.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Sharp all-round.

5702BB5443D646BC5F3A6A9538BF7432.name: Toast
5702BB5443D646BC5F3A6A9538BF7432.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. I desire the entire milky way.

09FB6CFF43DF8C5CE73F66B879A08301.name: Interruption
09FB6CFF43DF8C5CE73F66B879A08301.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Communication interrupted, please try again later.

A8462CD94BC71B81E17D8A945E3C5992.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. We are no different from you guys.

FB0178884D5F429F3193FF8E970DA1FF.name: Crossroad
FB0178884D5F429F3193FF8E970DA1FF.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Say farewell now.

E23851E245196F10DC229B9D7317B1B0.name: Bend
E23851E245196F10DC229B9D7317B1B0.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. You'll always come across sudden diversions.

8325FC88449B61C356374E98FCEFBE38.name: Extension Cord
8325FC88449B61C356374E98FCEFBE38.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. An extension line that peers into the future

F703D39341FB663B4497BE8D4DD73CAA.name: Dash
F703D39341FB663B4497BE8D4DD73CAA.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. A sharp turn for the worse.

902CBD484B89C18ADBB0F8AB2523F5D9.name: Cheelu
902CBD484B89C18ADBB0F8AB2523F5D9.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. A sharp turn for the worse. Twist, turn, and snap.

EBB5E3BC40B9AE0169D1DEB1571C65D1.name: Alert
EBB5E3BC40B9AE0169D1DEB1571C65D1.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Do not gently approach that fine night.

588D1E764113414FA81DF2A597833A1A.name: Buzz
588D1E764113414FA81DF2A597833A1A.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. The mind and the body resonate as one.

A5F4F61540E110D89566ED88F64CCBF4.name: Bright Light
A5F4F61540E110D89566ED88F64CCBF4.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Chasing a little firefly.

Item_q203050_001.name: Photo
Item_q203050_001.description: The highest place in the Northern Ring Ranges, overlooking the beautiful scenery of the Blue River and the Omnium Tower. A beautiful snapshot of a beautiful moment.
Item_q203050_001.source: Used for the Gorgeous Starry Sky mission.

Item_Static_02.name: Vitality booster
Item_Static_02.source: Increase max vitality by 20 and restore 20 vitality.

Item_birthdaycake.name: Birthday Cake
Item_birthdaycake.description: Serve it and say "happy birthday." Warm wishes are the icing on the cake.

Item_q203302_001.name: Electron Sensor
Item_q203302_001.description: A high-tech product developed by the Heirs of Aida. Used for opening electronic locks created by the Heirs of Aida.
Item_q203302_001.source: Used for the Agent Jason mission.

item_q204314_1.name: Mysterious Reagent
item_q204314_1.description: A mysterious crystal clear reagent given to you by a merchant at Banges Port.

item_q204314_2.name: Resource Pack
item_q204314_2.description: A package filled with certain goods, usually used for transactions between merchants.

fashion_dress_5_1_1.name: Visitor in the Snow (1d)
fashion_dress_5_1_1.description: A cold-resistant combat suit with powerful heat preservation functionality. Can resist low temperatures in severely cold regions.

fashion_dress_5_2_1.name: Visitor in the Snow (3d)
fashion_dress_5_2_1.description: A cold-resistant combat suit with powerful heat preservation functionality. Can resist low temperatures in severely cold regions.

fashion_dress_5_3_1.name: Visitor in the Snow (7d)
fashion_dress_5_3_1.description: A cold-resistant combat suit with powerful heat preservation functionality. Can resist low temperatures in severely cold regions.

fashion_dress_5_4_1.name: Visitor in the Snow
fashion_dress_5_4_1.description: A cold-resistant combat suit with powerful heat preservation functionality. Can resist low temperatures in severely cold regions.

fashion_dress_6_1_1.name: Roamer (1d)
fashion_dress_6_1_1.description: The Hykros suit made of a material that maintains a constant temperature. Can keep you warm while protecting you from the sun. A sensible choice for travelers.

fashion_dress_6_2_1.name: Roamer (3d)
fashion_dress_6_2_1.description: The Hykros suit made of a material that maintains a constant temperature. Can keep you warm while protecting you from the sun. A sensible choice for travelers.

fashion_dress_6_3_1.name: Roamer (7d)
fashion_dress_6_3_1.description: The Hykros suit made of a material that maintains a constant temperature. Can keep you warm while protecting you from the sun. A sensible choice for travelers.

fashion_dress_6_4_1.name: Roamer
fashion_dress_6_4_1.description: The Hykros suit made of a material that maintains a constant temperature. Can keep you warm while protecting you from the sun. A sensible choice for travelers.

fashion_dress_8_1_1.name: Star Sand (1d)
fashion_dress_8_1_1.description: A windproof suit made of a special composite material. Though it looks thick and sturdy, it is in fact quite light, offering both reliable protection and flexibility.

fashion_dress_8_2_1.name: Star Sand (3d)

Area2DogMeat.name: Fetid Beast Meat
Area2DogMeat.description: Food reserved for hounds. As unclean as it is malodorous.
Area2DogMeat.source: Used for Searching the Depths mission.

chip_1.name: Type I chip
chip_1.description: A chip with special functions, developed by Banges Tech. It's said to be used for opening password chest I.

chip_2.name: Type II chip
chip_2.description: A chip with special functions, developed by Banges Tech. It's said to be used for opening password chest II.

chip_3.name: Type III chip
chip_3.description: A chip with special functions, developed by Banges Tech. It's said to be used for opening advanced password chests.

chip_4.name: Type III Key
chip_4.description: A special lockpick designed by the Department of Science and Technology of Mirroria. It uses specialized encryption parameters and can be used to unlock the advanced password chests in Vera.
chip_4.source: Vera advanced password chest activation chip

Item_q104011-1.name: G-II Agent
Item_q104011-1.description: A drug used by Parliament to treat the strange disease afflicting the mine workers.
Item_q104011-1.source: Used for the Giggs the Rep mission.

item_q105016-1.name: Turbocharger
item_q105016-1.description: Used to repair the EM Blaster to break the ice on the Omnium Tower.

3879AE9A433DA99ADC68529730128EBC.name: Component Pack

Item_Mine_Area2Task.name: Refined Banges Ore
Item_Mine_Area2Task.description: A specialty of the Banges area. Cannot be refined by most ordinary people.

book_01_001.name: Metal Scraps
book_01_001.description: Rusty metal fragments that look warped and worn.

book_01_003.name: Electronic Instrument Component
book_01_003.description: An unknown electronic component. It is badly damaged. Completely unusable.

book_01_005.name: Dilapidated Electronic Dog
book_01_005.description: A mechanical pet dog exhibiting severe surface wear, though it is still in one piece.

21726671472B2A8623A8638E7BB94FB8.name: Diary Page
21726671472B2A8623A8638E7BB94FB8.description: The torn diary page found in the abandoned house in the fields. You can only make out one small paragraph.

item_q105025-1.name: Operation Outline: Part One
item_q105025-1.description: An operation outline written by the Heirs of Aida. You are unable to decipher the words on it.
item_q105025-1.source: Used for the Operation Outline mission

148426B7445B4EBE6F002AA27D225667.name: Laser Core
148426B7445B4EBE6F002AA27D225667.source: A key item for repairing the hovering cannon.

item_q1050151-1.name: Supply Box
item_q1050151-1.description: A supply box containing a variety of items.

item_q105061_1-1.name: Glacial Eel
item_q105061_1-1.description: The electric eels living in the glacier area are said to have fresh and tender meat that can quickly replenish your energy. You can use them to treat Zeke.
item_q105061_1-1.source: Used for Back to the Snowfield mission.

item_q105061_2-1.name: Frosted Berry
item_q105061_2-1.description: A kind of berry that grows near the glacier, and that is said to emit a bitter chill when consumed. Can be used to treat Zeke.
item_q105061_2-1.source: Used for Back to the Snowfield mission.

item_q105061_3-1.name: Frost Crystal
item_q105061_3-1.description: Crystals like this only form in extremely cold ice caves. Its effect is unknown. Can be used to treat Zeke.
item_q105061_3-1.source: Used for Back to the Snowfield mission.

Item_PermanerntEnergy_4.name: Mighty mushroom
Item_PermanerntEnergy_4.description: Contain enormous Omnium essence. Permanently increase max endurance by 50 when consumed.
Item_PermanerntEnergy_4.source: Permanently increase max endurance by 50 when consumed.

Item_q303003_1-1.name: Unknown Chip
Item_q303003_1-1.description: Claire gave you a new chip. Its specific function is unknown. Take it to Hopkins and exchange it for Melo's Chip.
Item_q303003_1-1.source: Used for the Melo's Upgrade Plan (III) mission.

Item_q303003_2-1.name: Melo's Chip
Item_q303003_2-1.description: Melo's language chip. Can restore Melo's language function.
Item_q303003_2-1.source: Used for the Melo's Upgrade Plan (III) mission.

Item_q303005_1-1.name: Astra Special Blend
Item_q303005_1-1.description: The specialty coffee of Astra Shelter. It seems to contain a hint of thornmato juice, giving it a strange taste.
Item_q303005_1-1.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (I) mission.

Item_q303005_2-1.name: Luhn Special Blend
Item_q303005_2-1.description: A special coffee invented by a Hykrosian named Luhn. Contains a hint of crimson petals, adding a certain sweetness.
Item_q303005_2-1.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (III) mission.

Item_q303005_3-1.name: Astra Special Blend Formula
Item_q303005_3-1.description: Outline how to brew Astra Special Blend.
Item_q303005_3-1.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (I) mission.

Item_q303005_4-1.name: Luhn Special Blend Formula

Item_q303005_4-1.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (III) mission.

Item_q303005_5-1.name: Banges Special Blend
Item_q303005_5-1.description: This special coffee from Banges Port has the strange taste of stellar soda and potato powder.
Item_q303005_5-1.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (II) mission.

C8BF7078484E305384814884B23BE586.name: Hykros Special Blend

item_activity2_Love_001_name.description: Light pink letter paper with dark patterns of peach blossoms. Pink is Hanna's favorite color.
item_activity2_Love_001_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_002_name.description: Light pink letter paper with patterns of roses. Pink is Hanna's favorite color.
item_activity2_Love_002_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_003_name.name: Rugosa Rose Letter
item_activity2_Love_003_name.description: Light pink letter paper with patterns of rugosa roses. Pink is Hanna's favorite color.
item_activity2_Love_003_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_004_name.description: Sunset-colored letter paper with patterns of sunflowers. Come watch the sunset on Cetus Island!
item_activity2_Love_004_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_005_name.description: Sunset-colored letter paper with patterns of daisies. Come watch the sunset on Cetus Island!

item_activity2_Love_006_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_007_name.name: Iris Letter
item_activity2_Love_007_name.description: Light blue letter paper with patterns of irises. Capture the clear sky when the Ferris wheel reaches its highest point.
item_activity2_Love_007_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_008_name.name: Bluebell Letter Paper
item_activity2_Love_008_name.description: Light blue letter paper with patterns of bluebells. Capture the clear sky when the Ferris wheel reaches its highest point.
item_activity2_Love_008_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_009_name.name: Cornflower Letter
item_activity2_Love_009_name.description: Light blue letter paper with patterns of cornflowers. Capture the clear sky when the Ferris wheel reaches its highest point.
item_activity2_Love_009_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_101_name.name: Moonlight
item_activity2_Love_101_name.description: Would like to use the moonlight as the paper, and take the night sky as ink, to write you this letter.
item_activity2_Love_101_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_102_name.name: Taffy
item_activity2_Love_102_name.description: The thought of you seems to even ease the stomachache... It feels warm.
item_activity2_Love_102_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_103_name.name: Wind Chime
item_activity2_Love_103_name.description: The breeze rang the wind chimes—perhaps urging me to see you?
item_activity2_Love_103_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_104_name.name: Musical Notes
item_activity2_Love_104_name.description: Put our memories on a music score.
item_activity2_Love_104_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_105_name.name: Rainy Season
item_activity2_Love_105_name.description: Long stretches of rain and thoughts intertwined throughout the rainy season.
item_activity2_Love_105_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_Love_106_name.name: Echo
item_activity2_Love_106_name.description: Unspoken words reverberate in the heart, and this time, I must write them down on paper.
item_activity2_Love_106_name.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity3_mould_1_name.name: Classic mooncake mold
item_activity3_mould_1_name.description: A mold for creating classic mooncakes. Don't eat the mold, no matter how hungry you are! Has a chance to drop from Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, from participating in the Mirroria Race, playing the Fight the Landlord at Joy Square or the arcade machines in the Casino, or purchasing goods from the terminals of Frontier Logistics.
item_activity3_mould_1_name.source: Required material for making mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.source: Can be exchanged for goods in the Crystal Dust Store after reaching Level 50.

chat-qipao-19.description: No mercy is the greatest respect she could give to foes begging under her blade.

chat-qipao-21.name: Special permissions
chat-qipao-21.description: "Freeze, scumbag! Give up now! Bang, bang!"

chat-qipao-23.name: Path of the Seeker

B423F4A74ABE015AA27C01B65E54FFCD.name: Hanging amusement park
B423F4A74ABE015AA27C01B65E54FFCD.description: Cetus Island amusement park - have fun like never before!

D21A88464D0E231599E87CBAAF7CDFD1.description: May the moon's white light guide you through the dark.

452885224D35F0CC8EFEEA8A84A113CC.name: Top Construction Team

33A8C3F5429BBE8BFADFCEB337564C38.name: Dawn: First Light
33A8C3F5429BBE8BFADFCEB337564C38.description: The night is darkest before the dawn.

5879115242DE3D2B481789A8FE4C4492.name: End of the Year
5879115242DE3D2B481789A8FE4C4492.description: This warm lamp embodies thousands of wishes.

65F9D6154EE7A303DC345E8D2EC98E5B.name: Love
65F9D6154EE7A303DC345E8D2EC98E5B.description: Record your anxious feelings of love, bit by bit.

chat_qipao24_name.description: I won't deny my code name Nemesis, but my real name is, Shirli.

chat_qipao25_name.description: Why would you care about the form of the carrier? Getting the job done is the top priority here.

chat_qipao26_name.name: Past Days
chat_qipao26_name.description: Circumstances change with the passage of time, but some always remain the same.

chat_qipao27_name.name: Pawpaw Dreamscape

chat_qipao28_name.name: Midnight Logic
chat_qipao28_name.description: At night, the peanuts are said to show some magical features—such as catching an otter that steals the food.

chat_qipao29_name.name: Pumpkin Party
chat_qipao29_name.description: Let's party all night long! And have a dream full of pumpkins.

chat_qipao30_name.name: Vanity of Life
chat_qipao30_name.description: Do robot Alf dream of electric dorayaki?

chat_qipao31_name.name: Set Off Again

chat_qipao32_name.name: A Fighter's Notes
chat_qipao32_name.description: To improve my combat skills, I'm going to defeat a few more Steel Lizards!

chat_qipao33_name.name: Phantom in the Mirror
chat_qipao33_name.description: Whether it's fake or real, the phantom in the mirror was finally shattered.

chat_qipao34_name.name: Hide-and-Seek Winner

chat_qipao36_name.name: Affection Bubble
chat_qipao36_name.description: The things that I wanted to say are not just dream-talk.

chat_qipao38_name.name: Dragon Boat Festival
chat_qipao38_name.description: Fragrance of mugwort, deep in thought.

chat_qipao39_name.name: Pure White Resonance
chat_qipao39_name.description: "The pure white core awakens. Now its power intertwines with ones with a heart of valor and justice! Resonate!"

chat_qipao40_name.name: The Doctor's Assistant
chat_qipao40_name.description: If only Hanna could do more for the doctor...

chat_qipao41_name.name: Summer Stream

chat_qipao42_name.name: Summer Festival
chat_qipao42_name.description: Swimming in the pool happily, the fish must be celebrating the festival as well!

chat_qipao43_name.name: Crackling Sounds

chat_qipao44_name.name: Innocence
chat_qipao44_name.description: The characteristics are not completely gone but at least gone by half...

chat_qipao45_name.description: Exclusive to the Fantasy Park theme event in the Douliu Community.
