chat_qipao50_name.name: Curious Cat
chat_qipao50_name.description: You can rest assured of her professional competence, but occasionally remind her to curb her overexuberant curiosity...

chat_qipao52_name.name: Glimpse

chat_qipao54_name.name: Golden Fruits
chat_qipao54_name.description: Autumn is a good time to enjoy the scenery and fruits.

chat_qipao55_name.name: Candy Feast
chat_qipao55_name.description: Eat more candies while your cavities aren't paying attention!

bag_chat_qipao48_name.name: Refreshing Swim Giftbox

bag_chat_qipao48_name.source: Use to get the avatar Rare Holiday, avatar frame Attention of the Pool, and chat bubble Refreshing Swim.

bag_chat_qipao52_name.name: End-Track Giftbox

bag_chat_qipao52_name.source: Use to get the avatar End-Track, avatar frame Speed Chaser, and chat bubble Glimpse.

Area4BranchTimeCapsuleA.description: An electronic notepad used for taking notes. Famous for its super standby mode.

FA79E0AF4049C4E23430B08B18A9040E.source: Can be used by Crewmates at deputy position and above.

Title_name_1_2_15_1.name: The Path of Balance
Title_name_1_2_15_1.description: Achieve 7,500 in gravity ball training proficiency.

AvatarFrame03_name.name: Shining Star
AvatarFrame03_name.description: Never envy anyone else's light—you are the most brilliant shining star!

AvatarFrame04_name.name: Leader of Astra
AvatarFrame04_name.description: He's the leader of Astra as well as a brother, just one of the countless ordinary folks wanting to protect their family.

AvatarFrame06_name.name: Pure Illusion
AvatarFrame06_name.description: "Don't you go anywhere, I'm not done playing yet!"

AvatarFrame07_name.name: Call of the Dead
AvatarFrame07_name.description: For your own safety, I don't think you should annoy the lady.

AvatarFrame08_name.name: Absolute Authority
AvatarFrame08_name.description: Her order is her will. There's no compromise in her missions.

AvatarFrame12_name.name: Tower's Core
AvatarFrame12_name.description: Hope or destruction? Different people hold different perspectives on it.

AvatarFrame13_name.name: Expert Creator
AvatarFrame13_name.description: Nobody can go back and redo the past, but you can create a new future from now on.

AvatarFrame14_name.name: SciFi World
AvatarFrame14_name.description: SciFi World December 2021 Issue Collaboration Exclusive Rewards.

AvatarFrame15_name.name: Assistant
AvatarFrame15_name.description: "Mi-a will send you back to Hykros with a drone if you are defeated."

AvatarFrame16_name.name: Hanging amusement park
AvatarFrame16_name.description: Cetus Island amusement park - have fun like never before!

AvatarFrame17_name.name: Champion Shopkeeper
AvatarFrame17_name.description: I don't want to be an Executor. I just wanna make dinner with you, Mi-a!

AvatarFrame18_name.name: Top Construction Team
AvatarFrame18_name.description: Every single drop of sweat and every single brick... I have to record every engineer's contribution to our construction efforts.

AvatarFrame19_name.name: Dawn: Morning Light
AvatarFrame19_name.description: The night is darkest before the dawn.

AvatarFrame20_name.name: Moon: Crossing Light
AvatarFrame20_name.description: May the moon's white light guide you through the dark.

AvatarFrame21_name.name: Peace and Joy
AvatarFrame21_name.description: The time has come to hang festive lanterns and welcome the coming spring.

AvatarFrame22_name.name: Tipsy
AvatarFrame22_name.description: Colorful dreams and intoxicating love, all in one piece of chocolate.

AvatarFrame23_name.name: Companion
AvatarFrame23_name.description: Part of the past has become a bubble in memory, but there are still things at hand that can be held tightly and never let go of.

AvatarFrame_24_name.name: Outside Body
AvatarFrame_24_name.description: Isn't it rather superficial to cast judgement on what life is or is not?

AvatarFrame_26_name.name: Knight of Night
AvatarFrame_26_name.description: A silent, vigilant guard, now protecting your machine pod.

AvatarFrame_27_name.name: Pawpaw Treasure
AvatarFrame_27_name.description: How many treasures did Smarty hide in the Pawpaw House? I'm curious.

AvatarFrame_28_name.name: Pumpkin Night
AvatarFrame_28_name.description: Pumpkins, pumpkins, pumpkins! I need more pumpkins!

AvatarFrame_29_name.name: Memories
AvatarFrame_29_name.description: Some things can remind us of our life before the Cataclysm.

AvatarFrame30_name.name: Gaze Mirroria
AvatarFrame30_name.description: Fantasies that span across the plane converge here.

AvatarFrame31_name.name: Steel Lizard Charge
AvatarFrame31_name.description: Lizards are also a type of dragon, so the Steel Lizard Charge is also a kind of dragon vehicle.

AvatarFrame32_name.name: Off-Balance Dancer
AvatarFrame32_name.description: Beneath the gorgeous skirt are crisis, mystery, and fear.

AvatarFrame34_name.name: Journey Nursery Rhyme
AvatarFrame34_name.description: Welcome back, Mi-a! Let's continue our journey.

AvatarFrame35_name.name: Cordate Jellybean
AvatarFrame35_name.description: Sweetness and love, all hidden in the small jellybeans.

AvatarFrame36_name.name: Naughty Trails
AvatarFrame36_name.description: Forget about all your anxieties and worries, and have a good time on Cetus Island!

AvatarFrame37_name.name: Aroma of Leaves
AvatarFrame37_name.description: Wrapped in jade and tied with rainbow, you chewy little pudding endearing like snow.

AvatarFrame38_name.name: Pure White Conversion
AvatarFrame38_name.description:
"Hey… do you think we can still win this one? The Violet Core is shattered. I guess we can't win this one. The enemy is too powerful."
"Regardless, we still have faith in the Violet Core and ourselves. We believe in the power of valor and justice."
"There's something strange about the Violet Core! Is that... a white light?!"

AvatarFrame39_name.name: Chief Park Ranger
AvatarFrame39_name.description: The maintenance of the park is complete! Dear customer, do you wanna join us for a ride?

AvatarFrame40_name.name: Salty Wave
AvatarFrame40_name.description: Beach, sand castle, aren't they the best matches for the salty soda?

AvatarFrame41_name.name: Summer Cool
AvatarFrame41_name.description: The fishtail swayed lightly, raising a trace of coolness in the heat.

AvatarFrame42_name.name: Sparkler Bouquet
AvatarFrame42_name.description: Compared with common bouquets, this exclusive festival decoration not only has sound effects and motion effects, but it also feels hot!

AvatarFrame43_name.name: Nurse Trainee
AvatarFrame43_name.description: They may not be experienced, but their sincere wish to help the Astra Shelter has made them shine.

AvatarFrame44_name.name: Fantasy Park
AvatarFrame44_name.description: Exclusive to the Fantasy Park theme event in the Douliu Community.

AvatarFrame45_name.name: Friend Astray
AvatarFrame45_name.description: Although she got lost on her way to her sister's cabin, she met two gentle but powerful knights and their elf companions.

AvatarFrame46_name.name: Watermelon Feast
AvatarFrame46_name.description: Should I slice it or cut it into chunks? Or maybe scoop it up with a spoon!?

AvatarFrame47_name.name: Attention of the Pool
AvatarFrame47_name.description: Even if unbeknownst to them, the gravitas of a celebrity is hard to hide...

AvatarFrame48_name.name: Responsibilities of a Disciplinarian
AvatarFrame48_name.description: I shall maintain the discipline of Mirroria School!

AvatarFrame49_name.name: Part-time Job
AvatarFrame49_name.description: You'll often see her sitting in Mirafleur Hall or at the Security Force entrance. However, in principle, she should stay at the Furnace Core Site, right?

AvatarFrame50_name.name: Carpe Diem
AvatarFrame50_name.description: Seize the day. You never know what will happen.

AvatarFrame51_name.name: Speed Chaser
AvatarFrame51_name.description: Lighting up your path to the future with my taillights!

AvatarFrame53_name.name: Annual Harvest
AvatarFrame53_name.description: Share your great harvest with friends.

Avatar03_name.name: Shirli
Avatar03_name.description: Remember not to burn the food again!

Avatar04_name.name: Zeke
Avatar04_name.description: I want to spend my days with my family in peace and quiet, but that's just an unrealistic delusion in the last days.

Avatar05_name.name: Frigg
Avatar05_name.description: Perhaps she'd appreciate you if you weren't opposing her?

Avatar06_name.name: Nemesis
Avatar06_name.description: Are you Shirli or something else now?

Avatar08_name.name: Seele
Avatar08_name.description: The adorable appearance befits the playful cruelty.

Avatar09_name.name: Tata
Avatar09_name.description: A lazy smart servant who offers the help you need when necessary.

avatar_10_name.name: Happy New Year
avatar_10_name.description: I wanted to personally give this to you—a New Year's gift from Mi-a.

avatar_11_name.name: May All Go Well
avatar_11_name.description: I believe these are called "fireworks"...? I wonder if they would look nicer on your Jetpack...

Avatar_12_name.name: Angel Frigg
Avatar_12_name.description: She isn't a demon, after all.

Avatar_13_name.name: Alf
Avatar_13_name.description: Alf looks like a lucky cat! Could it bring me good luck if I hug it every day?

Avatar_14_name.name: Peanut
Avatar_14_name.description: The first-gen smart servant with outstanding performance. Your trustworthy friend.

Avatar_16_name.name: Mad Dimon
Avatar_16_name.description: Mad Dimon, a once-popular electric pet, is now your smart servant companion.

Avatar_17_name.name: Tartarus
Avatar_17_name.description: Its prototype was the most popular children's toy before the Cataclysm. Recently, its manufacturer has invented a brand new smart servant called "Tartarus."

Avatar18_name.name: Infernal steel lizard
Avatar18_name.description: What are you staring at? Taste my steel lizard tail!

Avatar19_name.name: Song of the Puppet
Avatar19_name.description: She was shouting, she was dancing, and she was sobbing.

Avatar20_name.name: Dolly
Avatar20_name.description: Dolly is unique to me, and I am unique to Dolly...

Avatar21_name.name: Mi-a's Dream
Avatar21_name.description: While asleep, does Mi-a dream about... me and Shirli?

Avatar22_name.name: Strawberry Afternoon
Avatar22_name.description: Why does the crow look like a desk?

Avatar23_name.name: Hanna
Avatar23_name.description: Welcome to Cetus Island! Let me show you around.

Avatar24_name.name: Sticky Rice Ball
Avatar24_name.description: Let me guess, am I holding a sweet dumpling or meat dumpling? Oh, I've got it right!

Avatar25_name.name: Pure White Core
Avatar25_name.description: Purple fades, and while light shone through. It's a new force that can light up the night sky.

Avatar27_name.name: Celebration Memories
Avatar27_name.description: Do you remember the funny things that happened at the Graceday Celebration, little goldfish?

Avatar28_name.name: Summer Celebration Mechanic
Avatar28_name.description: Testing the new entertainment equipment is for the celebration activities, while she adjusted herself through the celebration.

Avatar29_name.name: Fledgling
Avatar29_name.description: This is the first person you meet at the beginning of a new, clean slate journey.

Avatar30_name.name: Joy Ride
Avatar30_name.description: Little Red Riding Hood carefully prepared a basket full of snacks and went out to play with her sister!

Avatar31_name.name: Fruity Summer
Avatar31_name.description: The essential cooldown for a scorching summer! Mi-a can't resist sweet frozen watermelons!

Avatar32_name.name: Rare Holiday
Avatar32_name.description: She needs more rest than she thought. That's not a bad thing, is it?

Avatar33_name.name: Traveling Shirli
Avatar33_name.description: The last stop of the journey: Mirroria!

Avatar34_name.name: Saki Fuwa the Disciplinarian
Avatar34_name.description: Who would've thought that the anime fangirl at every limited-merch sale would be so strict at school!

Avatar35_name.name: Reliable Mechanic
Avatar35_name.description: At least, that's how she refers to herself...

QuestItem_h202005-1.name: Seasoned Pasta
QuestItem_h202005-1.source: Said to be the favorite of a certain member of the Hyenas. Is this really alright?

Item_Mount_004.name: Dust Wheeler
Item_Mount_004.description: Crude and eye-catching. If it's presence and personality you're after, look no further. However, since someone noticed its antennae looks like little feelers, everyone started to think it was rather cute, which in turn attracted more buyers. Duplicates are converted to 100 dark crystals and 20,000 gold.

Mount_006_name.name: Crimson Meteor
Mount_006_name.description:
Glamorous! Radiant! It's the brightest crimson star in your vehicle collection!
Note: Crimson Meteor cannot hit triple speed. Please drive carefully.

Item_Mount_007.name: Mechbird
Item_Mount_007.description:
The new vehicle designed and built by Cobalt-B that is both fun and practical.
Cobalt-B had some rather unique names planned, but the marketing department put the kibosh on it: an easy-to-remember name is a good name.

Item_Mount_008.name: Aidan Knight
Item_Mount_008.description: Although this motorcycle is small, it is wholly equipped. Low cost, energy-efficient, with sufficient storage space, it is not only an excellent choice for couriers, but has become popular among traveling merchants in recent years.

Mount_002_a-1.name: Magnetic Rod
Mount_002_a-1.description:
This is not for hanging clothes out to dry!

An abandoned tower in the Rusty Belt. Is someone trying to put something on it?

Mount_002_b-1.name: Maglev Stalker
Mount_002_b-1.description:
It's not a sweeper droid!

The Vermin Brothers' cherished possession and possibly a future table prop. Low-probability drop from the Vermin Brothers.

Mount_003_a-1.name: Omnium Beast: Cockpit
Mount_003_a-1.description:
A comfy cabin that jolts when moving?

The workers on the drilling rig probably missed something.

Mount_003_b-1.name: Omnium Beast: Left Arm
Mount_003_b-1.description:
An Omnium-powered left arm of the cyberbeast. Please remain in your cabin and do not ride on the arm.

A gift from Bai Ling for those proficient in puzzle-solving in the shelter.

Mount_003_c-1.name: Omnium Beast: Right Arm
Mount_003_c-1.description:
An Omnium-powered right arm of the cyberbeast. Please remain in your cabin and do not ride on the arm.

Behemoths wandering Banges, Navia, and Crown are probably equipped with it. Low-probability drop from Behemoth - Surtur, Behemoth - Bergelmir, Behemoth - Fárbauti, Behemoth - Mimir, and Behemoth - Utgarda.

Mount_011_a-1.name: Voyager Engine
Mount_011_a-1.description:
"Voyager exclusive!" the user manual warns in a bright font. But it's almost never seen with the component.

The workers on the drilling rig probably missed something.

Mount_011_b-1.name: Voyager Thruster
Mount_011_b-1.description:
Compact and versatile with all the essential parts... Actually, every part is essential.

The Four Powers in the Navia region could carry it. Low-probability drop from Four Powers - Okka, Four Powers - Hethlu, Four Powers - Smoli, and Four Powers - Sendyrs.

Mount_011_c-1.name: Voyager Control Station
Mount_011_c-1.description:
Control station for the Voyager. It compels you to shout "Onward!" for some reason.

The Heirs of Aida hid stuff in their base on the dock.

Mount_011_d-1.name: Voyager Hull
Mount_011_d-1.description:
The first thing you'll want to do is give it a new paint job...

Hykros researchers would leave practical tools in the Ecological Stations in Navia.

Mount_004_a-1.name: Unicorn Power Core
Mount_004_a-1.description:
This vehicle engine is patent-pending, so no reverse engineering.

You might find something around the marvelous ore.

Mount_004_b-1.name: Unicorn Bionic Frame
Mount_004_b-1.description:
Hykros scholars once had a big fight over the material choice for bionics. The two sides submitted their own papers... So did the side with more papers win?

The dawn of new grounds for the Aida Bastion has come.

Mount_004_c-1.name: Unicorn Cyberlimbs
Mount_004_c-1.description:
"Cyberlimbs are cool!"... Wonder how many people that slogan will draw to buy the Monocross.

It's probably exhausting hauling boxes up the tower in Saag Passage.

Mount_004_d-1.name: Unicorn Head
Mount_004_d-1.description:
The head is armed with defensive blades, but they're often treated as accessories, hence the "Unicorn" moniker. Wonder how the creator feels about that.

Devotees of the Hyenas in the Crown region might carry it. Low-probability drop from Devotee Noah and Devotee Eber.

Item_Mount_013.description:
Complete the mission Franz's Gift to use.
A unique cube-shaped vehicle. Its built-in floating power unit allows it to move easily, even on bumpy roads. However, its flashy tape lights make it looks like a moving disco ball, and it is particularly obvious at night.

aige_name.name: Echo
aige_name.description: Good or bad? You be the judge.

bailing_name.name: Bai Ling
bailing_name.description: Could you stop looking at me like that? You're embarrassing me.

gulan_name.name: Cobalt-B
gulan_name.description: Through the blue cobalt glass, we can observe the actual color of the flame of burning metal.

hida_name.name: Hilda
hida_name.description: Move your body to the music by the sea. Let your thoughts drift with the waves to the other side.

kekelite_name.name: Cocoritter
kekelite_name.description: Sugar, stuffed toys, and all the sweet and gentle things in the world.

kelaodiya_name.name: Claudia
kelaodiya_name.description: Come to me if you need any help. I'll do my best.

king_name.description: I've been told millions of times that there's a fierce look in my eyes. Not sure how much these sunglasses will help with that.

ling_name.name: Zero
ling_name.description: Analyzing data. Please don't bother me for now.

saimier_name.name: Samir
saimier_name.description: There must be an unsolvable mystery, an endless road, and an unpredictable future.

sifengyuanyu_name.name: Tsubasa
sifengyuanyu_name.description: Her eyes wander because she's always on guard for the invisible dangers in the air.

peipei_name.name: Pepper
peipei_name.description: Wearing a smile at work is a demand she requires of herself.

wuwan_name.name: Crow
wuwan_name.description: As an entertainer, I certainly want your eyes on me all the time.

xiluo_name.name: Shiro
xiluo_name.description: Keep your distance and be patient. A gentle reminder: you might get attacked by the kitty claw if you stare at her for too long.

xiuma_name.name: Huma
xiuma_name.description: Like a blank piece of paper waiting for you to paint on it.

make_name.name: Marc
make_name.description: Every one of us is a unique creation.

baiyuekui_name.name: Bai Yuekui
baiyuekui_name.description: All sentient beings share the same pure and perfect spark essence of enlightenment.

Item_Mini_Echo01-1.name: Acoustic Module A-01
Item_Mini_Echo01-1.description: A part designed for a special sound-tracing system. Highly concealable.

Item_Mini_Echo02-1.name: Acoustic Module A-02
Item_Mini_Echo02-1.description: A part designed for a special sound-tracing system. Highly concealable.

Item_Mini_Echo03-1.name: Acoustic Module A-03
Item_Mini_Echo03-1.description: A part designed for a special sound-tracing system. Highly concealable.

item_sharephotocoin-1.name: Amusement park
item_sharephotocoin-1.description: Obtained by playing amusement facilities on the Cetus Island. Use them to exchange for Cetus Island exclusive rewards at Enfi on the island.
item_sharephotocoin-1.source: Exchange for Cetus Island exclusive rewards

3B3D094349F934F307A6159619090FAA.name: Scattered Signal
3B3D094349F934F307A6159619090FAA.description: Obtained by joining the Hopkins event. Find Omnium Beacons by following the signal and obtain rewards.

836419C1459B42D62D1FD089CD395670.name: Scattered Signal
836419C1459B42D62D1FD089CD395670.description: Obtained by joining the Hopkins event. Find Omnium Beacons by following the signal and obtain rewards.

1DA4F401477F05064DDD0580CE73DD80.name: Scattered Signal
1DA4F401477F05064DDD0580CE73DD80.description: Obtained by joining the Hopkins event. Find Omnium Beacons by following the signal and obtain rewards.

E4C18CE84EC05592BA1AE7952561503E.name: Hopkins Order
E4C18CE84EC05592BA1AE7952561503E.description: Pass for participation in events like Lost Signal and Dreamscape Challenge.
E4C18CE84EC05592BA1AE7952561503E.source: Join the Hopkins Order Event and get it daily.

A8000B5245EFD9912E2E26BE00972F3C.name: Champion Shopkeeper
A8000B5245EFD9912E2E26BE00972F3C.description: Achieve 1,500 revenue in Aida Cafe to unlock

xinshoubuji.name: Rookie Supplies
xinshoubuji.source: Use to obtain the items in the Rookie Supplies, or receive tanium ×60 plus dark crystal ×60 if already obtained.

maoxianlibao.name: Adventure Pack
maoxianlibao.source: Use to obtain the items in the Adventure Pack, or receive tanium ×300 plus dark crystal ×300 if already obtained.

DBF8B2E7403C8E83BBF105B10C8CD4AA.name: Probe
DBF8B2E7403C8E83BBF105B10C8CD4AA.description: Device launched by Hykros into other dimensions

Title_name_1_4_2_1.name: Crown of Thorns
Title_name_1_4_2_1.description: Rank No.1 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_name_1_4_2_2.name: Heroic Trailblazer
Title_name_1_4_2_2.description: Rank No.2 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_name_1_4_2_3.name: Brave Trailblazer
Title_name_1_4_2_3.description: Rank No.3 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_name_1_4_2_4.name: Explorer
Title_name_1_4_2_4.description: Rank No.4 or No.5 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_name_1_4_2_5.name: Footsetter
Title_name_1_4_2_5.description: Rank No.6–10 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_name_1_4_1_1.name: Crown of Stars
Title_name_1_4_1_1.description: Rank No.1 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_name_1_4_1_2.name: Heroic Starchaser
Title_name_1_4_1_2.description: Rank No.2 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_name_1_4_1_3.name: Brave Starchaser
Title_name_1_4_1_3.description: Rank No.3 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_name_1_4_1_4.name: Rival
Title_name_1_4_1_4.description: Rank No.4 or No.5 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_name_1_4_1_5.name: Challenger
Title_name_1_4_1_5.description: Rank No.6–10 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Item_FireworkQuest_Mine_1.name: Fireworks Component
Item_FireworkQuest_Mine_1.description: Key component for fireworks. Give it to Slayer, and you're guaranteed to see fireworks. You'll only see them sometimes if you don't.

584D345041062F6BD16FA8BA645F26C8.name: Black niter
584D345041062F6BD16FA8BA645F26C8.description: A rare rock from Aida used for making fireworks and not much else.
584D345041062F6BD16FA8BA645F26C8.source: Can be used to activate the fireworks scattered throughout Aesperia.

Item_Incarnation_01_name.name: Offering points
Item_Incarnation_01_name.description: Special tokens minted by Hykros to encourage collecting mana bio samples.
Item_Incarnation_01_name.source: Trade in mana bio samples for offering points that are redeemable for rewards in the Commissary.

Item_manasample_name.name: Mana bio sample
Item_manasample_name.description: Unknown biological sample. Store with caution.
Item_manasample_name.source: Submit mana bio samples for offering points that are redeemable for rewards in the Commissary.

Item_Gashapon_coin_01_name.name: Cetus Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_01_name.description: The gachapon coin that carries the best wishes of all the little Smart Servants on Cetus Island will definitely bring good luck!
Item_Gashapon_coin_01_name.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Cetus Carnival

Item_Gashapon_coin_02_name.name: Golden Sands Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_02_name.description: A gachapon coin engraved with a pyramid pattern, bringing the desert into the palm of your hand.
Item_Gashapon_coin_02_name.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Golden Sands.

Item_Gashapon_coin_03_name.name: Starry Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_03_name.description: A gachapon coin engraved with stars, bringing the music of the starry night to your ears.
Item_Gashapon_coin_03_name.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Wheel of Stars.

Item_Gashapon_coin_04_name.name: Fantasy Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_04_name.description: A fantasy gachapon coin. Hold it tight in your hand, so you know it's real.
Item_Gashapon_coin_04_name.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Wheel of Fantasy

Item_Gashapon_coin_05_name.name: Wormwood Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_05_name.description: A gachapon coin with the fragrance of wormwood. It makes for a good collectible probably.
Item_Gashapon_coin_05_name.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Wormwood's Aroma

Item_Gashapon_coin_06_name.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_06_name.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!
Item_Gashapon_coin_06_name.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Pure White

Item_Gashapon_coin_07_name.name: Seabreeze Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_07_name.description: A gachapon coin with the salty smell of the sea breeze. It's time to go on a vacation!
Item_Gashapon_coin_07_name.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Summer Seabreeze

Item_Gashapon_coin_08_name.name: Memories Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_08_name.description: Whenever you stop to look, memories come flooding in.
Item_Gashapon_coin_08_name.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Depths of Memory

Item_Gashapon_coin_09_name.name: Crimson Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_09_name.description: A magical item described in the picture book Crimson Tales. It's said to be chocolate-scented?
Item_Gashapon_coin_09_name.source: Used for the event gachapon of Crimson Ruby

Item_Gashapon_coin_12_name.name: Remembrance Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_12_name.description: A gachapon coin that contains wonderful memories. The summer breeze blew away the youthful worries...
Item_Gashapon_coin_12_name.source: Used for The Best Years event gachapon

Item_Gashapon_coin_15_name.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_15_name.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!
Item_Gashapon_coin_15_name.source: Used for the Pure White (Reissue) event gachapon

Item_Enlightenment_name.name: Star Grit
Item_Enlightenment_name.description: Scattered debris that fell along with the other planet from above. Reflects the luster of the stars.
Item_Enlightenment_name.source: Participate in the Path of Enlightenment event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_Enlightenment_02_name.name: Star scatter
Item_Enlightenment_02_name.description: Fine shards of stars that refract the light from outer space.
Item_Enlightenment_02_name.source: Participate in the Starcrossed Sky event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_ChildrensDayCoin_name.name: Bubbles
Item_ChildrensDayCoin_name.source: Magical bubbles obtained from the Childlike Innocence event. Can be redeemed for rewards at the event store.

Item_HiveJumpCoin_01_name.name: Enigmatic Badge
Item_HiveJumpCoin_01_name.description: The badge given to the HOTTA Studio's Enigmatic Lattice event participants. Come one, come all!
Item_HiveJumpCoin_01_name.source: Participate in the Enigmatic Lattice event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Store

Item_TowerDefenceCoin_01_name.name: Guardian Badge
Item_TowerDefenceCoin_01_name.description: An exquisitely designed badge. It represents great honor to Guardians.
Item_TowerDefenceCoin_01_name.source: Participate in the Dreamscape Guardian event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_SummerCoin_01_name.name: Heat Wave Coin
Item_SummerCoin_01_name.description: A token obtained from Graceday celebration in Banges Port. The passion of Banges' residents that handcrafted them still remains within them. As Graceday's official currency, they can be exchanged for rewards at the booths in all major markets.
Item_SummerCoin_01_name.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_MidAutumnCoin_01_name.name: Star sand
Item_MidAutumnCoin_01_name.description: The bottle is filled with childhood dreams.
Item_MidAutumnCoin_01_name.source: Can be obtained from the Echo Protocol, Mirroria Fastlane, or Star Sand Recycling events. Can be redeemed for rewards at the Event Store.

Item_AutumnCoin_01_name.name: Currency
Item_AutumnCoin_01_name.source: Obtained from participating in xx. Can be redeemed for rewards at the event store.

Item_CountryDay_Coin_name.name: Rainbow token
Item_CountryDay_Coin_name.description: A token that is handed out during the carnival in Mirroria. The brilliant lights embedded in each one add a nice touch to the lively atmosphere, but it would have been nicer if they came with batteries that lasted longer...
Item_CountryDay_Coin_name.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_Aida_token_name.name: Aida Keepsake
Item_Aida_token_name.description: Judgement is nigh. A new day shall dawn in fire.
Item_Aida_token_name.source: Activity item that can be used to exchange goods at the Keepsake Store during the event.

Item_Aida_photo_token_name.name: Encrypted Disk
Item_Aida_photo_token_name.description: A heavily encrypted disk with critical data. Maybe someone in Hykros can crack it...?
Item_Aida_photo_token_name.source: Activity item that can be used to exchange goods at the Keepsake Store during the event.

Item_Mount_014.name: Heavy Engine
Item_Mount_014.description: A batch of retro yet high-tech heavy engines reclaimed from the ruins of an auto plant. Lighthouse R&D's modifications enable them to speed over winding roads and counterstrike gorgers.

activation1_name.name: Activation Core I
activation1_name.description: A rare live bio-sample, with great research value.
activation1_name.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

activation2_name.name: Revitalized Energy Body
activation2_name.description: Revitalized energy body from the defeated raiding target. It may be of great interest to the researchers at Hykros.
activation2_name.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_OrienteeringCoin_01_name.name: Pacemaker Emblem
Item_OrienteeringCoin_01_name.description:
An emblem earned from the Mirroria Tour, hosted by the HOTTA Studio. See Mirroria from an all-new perspective!
Can be redeemed for items from the Mirroria Tour event store.
Item_OrienteeringCoin_01_name.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Mirroria Tour Event Store.

C160110148C3E37BC62EEE94ECC57909.name: Proof of Stellarway
C160110148C3E37BC62EEE94ECC57909.description: Executors returning from the break, I hope all of you haven't forgotten how to fight, and better believe that all efforts shall be rewarded.
C160110148C3E37BC62EEE94ECC57909.source: Can be exchanged for goods at the Stellarway Store.

0137C77C4A562EA29A47F7B72FDD8566.name: Gold-backed card
0137C77C4A562EA29A47F7B72FDD8566.description: Apparently accepted as currency at the Banges Black Market.
0137C77C4A562EA29A47F7B72FDD8566.source: Obtain by joining the Hopkins order event

EB13FB314D7545E4B0D4F8BC2D30B604.name: Proof of credit
EB13FB314D7545E4B0D4F8BC2D30B604.description: You've got to win Hopkins' trust if you want the best goods from his Black Market. Prove yourself a worthy customer.
EB13FB314D7545E4B0D4F8BC2D30B604.source: Obtain by joining the Hopkins order event

Mount006_1_Skin_01_name.name: Smoothie Meteor
Mount006_1_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Comes with free dessert coupons. Are you sure you don't want to try the new smoothie?

Mount006_2_Skin_01_name.name: Surveyor Meteor
Mount006_2_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
A vehicle made with reference to the appearance of a famous oceanologist. Well, the cute expression, though, could make the oceanologist both hate and love the vehicle at the same time, I guess?

Mount006_3_Skin_01_name.name: Arena Meteor
Mount006_3_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
A small number of past arena audience members wished that he'd leave a small autograph on the vehicle... But it'd probably cost a fortune by doing it on each one.

Mount006_4_Skin_01_name.name: Absconder Meteor
Mount006_4_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
If he comes to us for the copyright payment, just tell him that the related personnel has already been fired.

Mount006_5_Skin_01_name.name: Windrunner Meteor
Mount006_5_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
The performance should be identical to other models, yet it feels faster riding in this one.

Mount006_6_Skin_01_name.name: Freedom Meteor
Mount006_6_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
When will we race on another planet? Freedom Meteor is ready!

Mount006_7_Skin_01_name.name: Roaming Meteor
Mount006_7_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Could it be an illusion that I always feel like an ace when I'm on this thing? Or maybe it's not an illusion at all?

Mount006_8_Skin_01_name.name: Scuba Meteor
Mount006_8_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its reinforced carapace can adapt to greater pressure underwater... But this was not meant to be operated undersea.

Mount006_9_Skin_01_name.name: Supercomputing Meteor
Mount006_9_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Equipped with a mini supercomputer that can deal with all kinds of road surfaces. It's just sometimes the computer is too small to handle a large amount of calculations, and errors could occur.

Mount006_10_Skin_01_name.name: Modular Meteor
Mount006_10_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Even a homebody can be a skilled driver thanks to the training they received in racing games.

Mount006_11_Skin_01_name.name: Nightfeather Meteor
Mount006_11_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Sweeping past the corners like a nightfeather. Are you sure you don't want a race?

Mount006_12_Skin_01_name.name: Reminiscent Meteor
Mount006_12_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Sit in this beauty and be a bright star shooting across the sky.

Mount006_13_Skin_01_name.name: Phantasmic Meteor
Mount006_13_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
One could dream of lightning-fast rides in this vehicle.

Mount006_14_Skin_01_name.name: Steady Meteor
Mount006_14_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
You would unconsciously slow down and drive safely in this one―Hey! What are these little critters doing behind us?

Mount006_15_Skin_01_name.name: DIY Meteor
Mount006_15_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Did some modifications to it when I happened to see it the other day. Not sure if its performance gets affected...

Mount006_16_Skin_01_name.name: Rockin' Meteor
Mount006_16_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its music system has fifty Aida hit songs preloaded. Turn up the tunes, and go for a ride.

Mount006_21_Skin_01_name.description:

Mount006_22_Skin_01_name.name: Miraculous Meteor
Mount006_22_Skin_01_name.description:

Mount006_23_Skin_01_name.description:

Mount006_27_Skin_01_name.name: Flame Chaser Meteor
Mount006_27_Skin_01_name.description:

Mount006_28_Skin_01_name.name: Med Meteor
Mount006_28_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Comes with a medical kit for safe journeys.

Mount006_29_Skin_01_name.name: Wishing Meteor
Mount006_29_Skin_01_name.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
If you happen to see a meteor shower while driving this vehicle, make a wish, and it might come true.

Title_name_1_1_6_1.name: Island Pioneer
Title_name_1_1_6_1.description: A title obtained after reaching 100% exploration on Artificial Island.

HomeDevelopLog_Title1.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 1
HomeDevelopLog_Title1.description:
Starting log...
It's early in the morning, and Mr. Kolador said there'd been an unusual retracement on the Artificial Island we're developing. How is that possible? He must be making a fuss. Retracement is a core technology of Hykros that only they can master. As an ordinary technician, if I can make it happen...
Um..? There really is a transient unstable retracement, which seems to be related to the spacerift. I gotta fix it quickly. Am I losing my job? Maybe I'm qualified for Hykros now...?

HomeDevelopLog_Title2.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 2
HomeDevelopLog_Title2.description:
Starting log...
Today, we've debugged the spacerift on Artificial Island. All was normal, and everything went on smoothly. Mr. Kolador is such a wonderful man, as he didn't give me a hard time due to the rewind incident. However, my friend wasn't as lucky since he was fired by Cobalt-B today. Regardless of how I asked, he refused to tell me the reason. Yet, all that came out of his mouth was the word, moodcard, which I have absolutely no clue about.
It was probably some embarrassing mistake. After all, Cobalt-B holds such a high bar.

HomeDevelopLog_Title3.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 3
HomeDevelopLog_Title3.description:
Starting log...
My colleagues have all gone bonkers! These fools have taken advantage of the SSR weapons Hykros provided for the people of Aesperia and started a fight with the Hyenas on the Artificial Island.
You're just technicians, not Executors! So, get back to work! I'm the only one here working my butt off! If you were to read this log of mine, my esteemed Mr. Kolador, I'd hope you'll consider giving me a raise since that's definitely the best way to affirm my value. With that said, should I choose Dual EM Stars or Rosy Edge?

HomeDevelopLog_Title4.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 4
HomeDevelopLog_Title4.description:
Starting log...
Last night, I went to Cetus Island on my lonesome to watch the fireworks. Not only was it spectacular, but the music was also wonderful. That's why I proposed to Mr. Kolador that we should set off fireworks all day long on Artificial Island. However, he rejected the romantic proposal on the grounds that it might blow up the island's barrier.
If Dr. Claire requires a staff member who's not just a puppet, I'm willing to join her... Never mind, please delete this paragraph. Mr. Kolador was quite right in what he said. That was thoughtless of me, and there's still so much I have to learn from him.

HomeDevelopLog_Title5.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 5
HomeDevelopLog_Title5.description:
Starting log...
Right now, I'm logging with my "little feet," stomping on the keyboard. Hykros' stuff is so unstable! Their weapons went haywire and shrunk me to the size of a needlebee, and I almost got swatted by the Executors!
Development on the Artificial Island will have to be put on hold today. After all, it's too inconvenient for this "tiny me" to work. Mr. Kolador would understand me. Hopefully, Hykros will solve this problem within a week.

HomeDevelopLog_Title6.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 6
HomeDevelopLog_Title6.description:
Starting log...
I'm so excited, so excited! You have no idea what I saw today! I met Ms. Bai from the "other planet" in Navia! She was on a mission, but I'm sure she noticed me!
Although she was far away, she must have seen me! Yes, I felt it! Initiate Hykros Special Order, and search for "Alaya"...

HomeDevelopLog_Title7.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 7
HomeDevelopLog_Title7.description:
Starting log...
I should be on my vacation now, but there is a new problem with the Artificial Island... So here I am again. Right now, everyone outside the Artificial Island must be setting off fireworks... I could really use a nap right now... a nap... right now... ZZzzz

HomeDevelopLog_Title8.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 8
HomeDevelopLog_Title8.description:
Starting log...
The vacation is over, and the Artificial Island is stable for now. I hope Mr. Kolador will give me an extra reward for my performance during the vacation! Besides, I found something suspicious today! It's so suspicious! A colleague of mine came back from his vacation with very thick hair!
He used to be just like me... No, even worse than me! What on earth did he do during the vacation?! Perhaps I should go and ask him about it...

HomeDevelopLog_Title9.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 9
HomeDevelopLog_Title9.description:
Starting log...
There has been a minor issue with Banges recently, but Hykros managed the situation well. Now, some Banges residents, including me, are in quarantine. But! Quarantine won't stop me from developing the Artificial Island! Just connect to the Artificial Island server remotely, and I can start the work of love! Ah... the connection is so poor...
Hope everyone in Banges can get better quickly, and for all of Aida to get better, come on!

HomeDevelopLog_Title10.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 10
HomeDevelopLog_Title10.description:
Starting log...
The construction of Artificial Island Phase 1 is almost complete. What is most crucial right now is to drive the Hyenas away, and the quickest solution for that would be to request The Executor Order for assistance. Gosh, I'm so clever! Anyways, I'll suggest it to Mr. Kolador right this instant...
I've heard from a friend of Hykros that they've recently gotten hold of Vera's spacetime coordinates. I'd love to be able to head on over there to take a look once I'm done with my work on the Artificial Island...

imitation_fashion_21_w_name.name: Falling Flames
imitation_fashion_21_w_name.description: A magical creation that contains mysterious energy in the picture book Crimson Tale. It's also Little Red Riding Hood's closest friend.
imitation_fashion_21_w_name.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Falling Flames

imitation_fashion_21_bag_name.name: Crimson Song & Falling Flames
imitation_fashion_21_bag_name.description: The little girl receives the red cloak from her sister. Wow, she gets so excited that she forgets to hide her tail!
imitation_fashion_21_bag_name.source: Use to get the premium Simulacrum Crimson Song and the weapon appearance Falling Flames.

imitation_fashion_17_name.name: Shirli
imitation_fashion_17_name.description: It's an image extracted from memories... It's just an illusion.

imitation_fashion_17_w_name.name: White Dwarf
imitation_fashion_17_w_name.description: A shining star might look small, but it gives off unimaginable energy.
imitation_fashion_17_w_name.source: Unlock the weapon appearance White Dwarf

imitation_fashion_10_name.name: Argent Intuition
imitation_fashion_10_name.description: It's difficult to find a balance between formal attire and work clothes. Only she insists that true art is a mix of practicality and artistry...
imitation_fashion_10_name.source: Unlock the premium Simulacrum Argent Intuition

imitation_fashion_10_w_name.name: Silver Flame Revolver
imitation_fashion_10_w_name.description: It would be great if I could apply paints of all colors to the flame... but there are still many technical problems to overcome.
imitation_fashion_10_w_name.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Silver Flame Revolver

Item_PanelKey_FoxCave_name.name: Activation Module
Item_PanelKey_FoxCave_name.source: Can be used to activate the dormant control console.

Avatar_linye_name.name: Lin
Avatar_linye_name.description: She did allow her fans to use her photos, provided that it was not for commercial purposes, and only minor post-processing was done.

763A54D3493E2F9D4A85F7990AA9950A.name: Energy activation charger
763A54D3493E2F9D4A85F7990AA9950A.description: Special material used to power machines
763A54D3493E2F9D4A85F7990AA9950A.source: Can be used to increase Appointed Research progress.

Title_1_4_5_1_name.name: Top Ten
Title_1_4_5_1_name.description: Get in the top ten of Break From Destiny to unlock this title.

fragment_reactor_orange_name.name: Fortress microreactor shard
fragment_reactor_orange_name.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides stats support.
fragment_reactor_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse one of the following fortress microreactor types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, Arc.

fragment_reactor1_orange_name.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Overload)
fragment_reactor1_orange_name.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides physical support.
fragment_reactor1_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Overload)

fragment_reactor2_orange_name.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Glaze)
fragment_reactor2_orange_name.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides frost support.
fragment_reactor2_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Glaze)

fragment_reactor3_orange_name.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Burst)
fragment_reactor3_orange_name.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides flame support.
fragment_reactor3_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Burst)

fragment_reactor4_orange_name.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Arc)
fragment_reactor4_orange_name.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides volt support.
fragment_reactor4_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Arc)

fragment_reactor5_orange_name.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Altered)
fragment_reactor5_orange_name.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides altered-type support.
fragment_reactor5_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Altered)

fragment_reactor_purple_name.name: Elite microreactor shard
fragment_reactor_purple_name.description: A microreactor equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.
fragment_reactor_purple_name.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse one of the following elite microreactor types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, Arc.

fragment_reactor5_purple_name.name: Elite Microreactor Shard (Altered)
fragment_reactor5_purple_name.description: A microreactor equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.
fragment_reactor5_purple_name.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the elite microreactor (Altered)

fragment_exoskeleton_orange_name.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard
fragment_exoskeleton_orange_name.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides excellent stat support.
fragment_exoskeleton_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse one of the following fortress exoskeleton types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, and Arc.

fragment_exoskeleton1_orange_name.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Overload)
fragment_exoskeleton1_orange_name.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides physical support.
fragment_exoskeleton1_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Overload).

fragment_exoskeleton2_orange_name.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Glaze)
fragment_exoskeleton2_orange_name.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides frost support.
fragment_exoskeleton2_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Glaze).

fragment_exoskeleton3_orange_name.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Burst)
fragment_exoskeleton3_orange_name.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides flame support.
fragment_exoskeleton3_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Burst).

fragment_exoskeleton4_orange_name.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Arc)
fragment_exoskeleton4_orange_name.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides volt support.
fragment_exoskeleton4_orange_name.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Arc).

fragment_exoskeleton_purple_name.name: Elite Exoskeleton Shard
fragment_exoskeleton_purple_name.description: An exoskeleton equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.
fragment_exoskeleton_purple_name.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse one of the following elite exoskeleton types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, and Arc.

Title_1_4_4_5_name.name: Boundless Realm Visitor
Title_1_4_4_5_name.description: Clear level 15 in the Boundless Realm to unlock.

Title_1_4_4_6_name.name: Boundless Realm Walker
Title_1_4_4_6_name.description: Clear level 30 in the Boundless Realm to unlock.

Title_1_4_4_7_name.name: Boundless Realm Pioneer
Title_1_4_4_7_name.description: Clear level 45 in the Boundless Realm to unlock.

Title_1_1_11_1_name.name: Abyss Listener
Title_1_1_11_1_name.description: Title for reaching 100% Confounding Abyss exploration.

Title_Overseas_name_1.name: Vanguard Trailblazer
Title_Overseas_name_1.description: Unlocks by participating in the Live Stream event.

Title_Overseas_name_2.name: Hykros Observer
Title_Overseas_name_2.description: A Pioneer who has made outstanding contributions to the promotion of Tower of Fantasy.

Title_Overseas_name_3.name: Greatest Creator
Title_Overseas_name_3.description: Unlocked by being selected during the CBT's Submission Event

Item_Mount_016.name: Warcart of Tomorrow
Item_Mount_016.description: Once it accelerates to 888 miles per hour, it can break through the time barrier and go to any time period...
Item_Mount_016.source: Unlock the vehicle Warcart of Tomorrow

imitation_fashion_23_name.name: Sleek Summer Shade
imitation_fashion_23_name.description: Even this well-known busy person of Mirroria occasionally enjoys some time off by the exclusive luxury pool.
imitation_fashion_23_name.source: Unlock the premium Simulacrum Sleek Summer Shade

imitation_fashion_23_w_name.name: Misty Weave
imitation_fashion_23_w_name.description: The wind blown by this fan seems cooler than before... Though it may just be the visual effects which make it seem that way?
imitation_fashion_23_w_name.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Misty Weave

imitation_fashion_23_bag_name.name: Sleek Summer Shade & Misty Weave
imitation_fashion_23_bag_name.description: Even this well-known busy person of Mirroria occasionally enjoys some time off by the exclusive luxury pool.
imitation_fashion_23_bag_name.source: Use to get the premium Simulacrum Sleek Summer Shade and the weapon appearance Misty Weave.

Avatar_xinghuan_name.name: Lyra
Avatar_xinghuan_name.description: I'm simply following Ms. Maidelin's orders, that's all.

MapRadar_name.name: Radar detector
MapRadar_name.description: The latest radar detector developed by the Mirroria Science and Technology Department. An essential tool for Wanderers.
MapRadar_name.source: Use to randomly detect an undiscovered World Exploration point, supply pod, Grayspace spatial rift, Grayspace crystal dust, Twilight Zone Secret Box, or Twilight Zone Spacetime Crystal, and generate and record the location's navigation mark.

MapRadarPoint_name.name: Navigation Beacon
MapRadarPoint_name.description: A complimentary device to the radar detector. The only choice for Wanderers.
MapRadarPoint_name.source: Used to display exploration point coordinates.

58E0299B4B59D0667C3476AFBFB5D28E.name: Basic Executor Voice Pack
58E0299B4B59D0667C3476AFBFB5D28E.source: That introvert of an Executor is way chattier than before!?

Mount_017_a_name.name: Nova Engine
Mount_017_a_name.description: Don't underestimate its horsepower based on its cute appearance!
Mount_017_a_name.source: Used to unlock the Nova vehicle.

Mount_017_b_name.name: Nova Base
Mount_017_b_name.description: A three-wheeled design, stable and safe. Great for travel, food delivery, cargo transportation, and household essentials!
Mount_017_b_name.source: Used to unlock the Nova vehicle.

Mount_017_c_name.name: Nova Hull
Mount_017_c_name.description: I have to admit that this thing looks like a toy, but it's totally a different story on the manual...
Mount_017_c_name.source: Used to unlock the Nova vehicle.

fragment_Mount_017_c_name.name: Nova Shard (Carapace)
fragment_Mount_017_c_name.description: I have to admit that this thing looks like a toy, but it's totally a different story on the manual...
fragment_Mount_017_c_name.source: Collect 100 shards to fuse Nova (Carapace), which can be used to unlock the vehicle Nova.

Avatar_tianlang_name.name: Sirius
Avatar_tianlang_name.description: I am the owner of the Mirroria Nursery. Don't spill the beans on my alter ego!

Avatar36_name.name: End-Track
Avatar36_name.description: Ride like the wind! Passion is forever young.

AvatarFrame_Overseas_1_name.name: Greatest Creator
AvatarFrame_Overseas_1_name.description: Limited reward for outstanding creators during the CBT.

AvatarFrame_Overseas_2_name.name: Illusory Link
AvatarFrame_Overseas_2_name.description: Do we exist, or are we just shadows of some parallel universe?

AvatarFrame_Overseas_3_name.name: Creatower
AvatarFrame_Overseas_3_name.description: An outstanding ToF creator. We can tell you love the game!

AvatarFrame_Overseas_4_name.name: Creatower Master
AvatarFrame_Overseas_4_name.description: An extremely professional ToF creator. ToF is grateful to have an inspiration like you!

AvatarFrame_Overseas_5_name.name: Creatower of Fantasy
AvatarFrame_Overseas_5_name.description: A fantastical ToF creator, one who is already one with the team... You are already one with the team, congrats!

Avatar_Overseas_1_name.name: Zeke: Awakening
Avatar_Overseas_1_name.description: Maybe ol' Zeke can even be cute sometimes?

Avatar_Overseas_2_name.name: Shirli: Awakening
Avatar_Overseas_2_name.description: "Do I look silly to you when I smile?" Some dumb cute girl said so while swinging her fists.

Avatar_korea_1_name.name: Mi-a: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_1_name.description: Mi-a is currently executing the dressing sequence, please wait.

Avatar_korea_2_name.name: Nemesis: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_2_name.description: I think I had a dream. I saw a lot of things in this dream.

Avatar_korea_3_name.name: Shirli: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_3_name.description: Do we wanna go to Cetus Island together?

Title_1_1_10_2_name.name: Mirroria Pathfinder
Title_1_1_10_2_name.description: Title for reaching 100% Mirroria Zone B exploration.

Title_1_1_10_3_name.name: Mirroria Navigator
Title_1_1_10_3_name.description: Title for reaching 100% Mirroria Zone C exploration.

Item_gift_T101008.name: A Screenwriter's Blog
Item_gift_T101008.description: A book that contains the screenwriter's personal experiences. Due to its incredible ability to put its readers to sleep, some use it as a sleeping aid.

Item_gift_T101010.name: Security Force Training Diary
Item_gift_T101010.description: A training manual for special agents of the Security Force. It contains training methods shared by senior members, making it a must-read for new members.

Item_gift_T101015.name: Rider Postcard
Item_gift_T101015.description: A postcard signed by a famous rider.

Mount_Racing_001.description: When its engine roared and it sped away, there was only one sound left ringing in the ears of the crowd: Thunder.

Title_1_4_6_1_name.description: Title for getting 1st place in Origin of War.

AvatarFrame_Overseas_6_name.name: Raging Sands
AvatarFrame_Overseas_6_name.description: The desert, where a new adventure begins.

Avatar_Overseas_8_name.name: The Queen
Avatar_Overseas_8_name.description: Want to taste my boot and chainsaw?

Avatar_Overseas_10_name.name: Ruby: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_10_name.description: Lin... Why can't I control... my own hands?

Avatar_Overseas_11_name.name: Lin: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_11_name.description: I can't dance... Like I said, I'm not an idol!

Item_Gashapon_coin_16_name.name: Rosy Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_16_name.description: A special invitation from the costume party. The danger inside cannot be evaded.
Item_Gashapon_coin_16_name.source: Used for the Thorned Rose event gachapon.
